loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase various products for her store, such as sweet bread, cookies, candy, eggs, oil, rice, etc.

loans.name: Johana Lizeth

texts.es:
Johana Lizeth, de 35 años reside  en casa familiar con  su esposo, tres hijos y su madre. Johana es una mujer emprendedora que durante mucho tiempo ha trabajado para sacar adelante a su familia. Ella posee un pequeño negocio el cual consiste en una tiendita que ha instalado en su hogar. Ella sabe que la única forma para sacar adelante a su familia es trabajando y eso es lo que hace. Cuenta con mucha clientela y es muy reconocida en la zona. Ella sueña con ver a sus hijos convertidos en profesionales y es por eso que lucha por mantener activa su tienda ya que es una las principales fuentes de ingreso. 

Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito ya que desea invertir en su negocio y poder comprar variedad de artículos como: bebidas, pan dulce, golosinas, detergentes, azúcar, arroz, frijoles, entre otros. De esta manera espera obtener mayores ingresos que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Johana Lizeth is 35 years old and lives in the family home with her husband, three children, and her mother.  She is an enterprising woman who has spent a great deal of time working so that her family can get ahead.  Johana has a small business that consists of a store that is established in her home.  She knows that working is the only way for her family to move forward, so she is willing to do her job.  Johana has many customers and is well-known in the area.  Her dream is to see her children become professionals, so she strives to keep her store active since it is one of her main sources of income.

Johana has decided to request a loan because she wants to invest in her business.  This will enable her to buy a variety of products such as beverages, sweet bread, candy, detergents, sugar, rice, beans, and other items.  In this manner, she hopes to generate more income so that she can improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of products for her store, such as beverages, sweet bread, candy, deterdents, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Edwin Ernesto

texts.es:
Edwin Ernesto, de 34 años de edad, habita en casa propia, con su esposa y dos hijos. Edwin posee una tienda en su casa de habitación en donde vende frutas, pan dulce, recargas para celular, juguetes, etc. Ha trabajado durante mucho tiempo para sacar adelante a su familia y su sueño es poder darles a sus hijos todo lo necesario para que sigan estudiando y lleguen a ser grandes profesionales. 

Por esta razón ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL  para invertir en su negocio y poder comprar variedad de frutas como sandías, naranjas, uvas, manzanas. Además comprar variedad de pan dulce y de juguetes que es lo que el ofrece en su negocio. Todo esto lo hace con la fe puesta en Dios que va poder obtener mayores ganancias que le permitirán mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su querida familia.
texts.en:
Edwin Ernesto is 34 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and two children.  He has a store in his home where he sells fruit, sweet bread, rechargeable mobile phone cards, toys, and other items.  Edwin has worked a long time so that his family can get ahead.  His dream is to provide his children everything they need so that they can continue their studies and become successful professionals.  

For this reason, Edwin has decided to request a loan from Apoyo Integral to invest in his business.  He plans to buy a variety of fruits such as watermelons, oranges, grapes, and apples.  In addition, he will purchase a variety of sweet breads and toys to offer in his business.  Everything he does is achieved through his faith in God so that he can generate more income, which will allow him to improve his quality of life and that of his beloved family.

loans.use: to purchase watermelon, oranges, bread, and toys to sell in his store.

loans.name: Anita De Los Ángeles

texts.es:
Anita D. los Ángeles, D. 44 años D. edad, habita en casa  propia con su esposo y sus cuatro hijos. Anita posee una pequeña panadería en su hogar D. habitación en la cual elabora y venD. pan dulce. Ha trabajado toda su vida para sacar adelante a su familia y lo que más quiere es poder darles una mejor calidad D. vida. Ella es muy conocida en la zona ya que se caracteriza por ser amable y mantener variedad D. pan dulce al mejor precio y calidad. 

Últimamente ha notado que la demanda D. sus productos ha incrementado y esto la ha llevado a tomar la decisión D. solicitar este crédito para poder comprar más materia prima como: harinas, azúcar, canela, colorantes, aceite, etc. Con la fe puesta en Dios que D. esta forma lograra cumplir su sueño y podrá ofrecer mejor calidad D. vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Anita D. los Ángeles is 44 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and four children.  She has a small bakery in her home where she produces and sells sweet bread.  Anita has worked all of her life so that her family can get ahead.  What she wants most is to give them a better quality of life.  She is well-recognized in her area and known for being friendly and maintaining a variety of quality sweet bread at a good price.  

As of late, Anita has noticed that the demand for her products has increased.  Therefore she has decided to request a loan in order to buy more supplies such as flour, sugar, cinnamon, food coloring, oil, and other products.  With her faith in God, Anita is on her way to fulfilling her dream and providing a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for making sweet bread, including flour, sugar and cinnamon.

loans.name: Conroy Kitchen Group

texts.en:
Leorcadia M. is the leader of the Conroy Kitchen Group. She is 49 years old and married with four children, ages 26, 20, 12 and 10. Two of the children are attending school. She has a restaurant business in Gweru in Zimbabwe. She has been running this business for two years and sells cooked food at Shurugwi. She does not have any other sources of income. The main challenge she faces is the lack of adequate cooking utensils. 

Leorcadia requested this loan through MicroKing for $400 to buy kitchen equipment including utensils, serving dishes, tables and chairs. In the future, she plans to open a bigger restaurant.

loans.use: to buy kitchen equipment.

loans.name: Natividad Adán

texts.es: Natividad Adán G. M. de 50 años de edad, habita en su casa en el Municipio de San Miguel Tepezontes del Departamento de La paz. Él posee una tienda en su hogar de residencia la cual ha tenido durante mucho tiempo. Es un hombre trabajador que lucha día a día para salir adelante y poder mejorar su calidad de vida. Su sueño es ver su tienda abastecida y contar con lo necesario para que los clientes siempre encuentren lo que buscan. Para él lo más importante son sus clientes siempre se preocupa por brindarles el mejor servicio y de hacerlos sentir que son importantes, de esta forma ha logrado una clientela muy grande y  cada día le demandan más sus productos. Esto lo ha impulsado a solicitar este crédito para tener la capacidad de comprar variedad de productos para tienda tales como: arroz, azúcar, golosinas, pan dulce, aceite, papel, detergentes y todo lo necesario para mantener surtida su tiendita y lograr incrementar sus ventas y así poder obtener mayores ingresos que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Natividad Adán G. M., 50, lives in his house in the town of San Miguel Tepezontes, La Paz Department.  He has a home based store that he’s had for a long time.  He is a hard working man who struggles daily to get ahead and improve his quality of life.

His dream is to see that his store is well stocked and to have everything necessary so that his customers can always find what they are looking for.  For him, his customers are the most important thing and he strives to provide the best service and make them feel important.  This has led to him gaining a large clientele that every day increases their demand for his products.  

This has impelled him to request a loan in order to be able to buy a variety of items for the store like: rice, sugar, snacks, pastries, oil, paper, detergent and everything necessary to have his small store stocked to increase sales and reach higher profits that will lead to an improved quality of life.

loans.use: to buy stock items for his store.

loans.name: Nonignon Group

texts.fr: NONIGNON est un groupement constitué de dix sept personnes et dont la présidente (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est nommée Sylvie. Les membres du groupe résident dans le même quartier à Womey dans la commune d’Abomey Calavi. Dans le but d’augmenter leur fonds de roulement, ce groupement sollicite pour la première fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé.Née le 16 Mars 1959 à Adjohoun dans le département de l’Ouémé, Sylvie vit depuis douze ans à Womey avec sa famille. Sylvie est mariée à un mécanicien du nom de Paulin et a quatre enfants, qui sont tous  scolarisés. Sylvie assure ensemble avec son mari les différentes charges de la maison. Sylvie a arrêté l'école au cours secondaire. Depuis environs trois ans, Sylvie vend des condiments de sauce, des boissons et des tissus de façon secondaire dans sa boutique sise à son domicile. Cette activité lui génère des revenus l'aidant à contribuer aux dépenses familiales. Sylvie achète ses produits à Dantokpa, marché international du Bénin. Ce premier prêt permettra certainement à Sylvie et à son groupe de rehausser le niveau de leur activité et d’accroître leur clientèle et leur revenu.
texts.en: NONIGNON is a group made up of seventeen people, whose president is called Sylvie (she has her hand raised in the photograph). The group members live in the same quarter of Womey in the Abomey Calavi area. In order to boost their working capital, this group is seeking their first loan from ALIDé. Sylvie was born on the 16th March 1959 in Adjohoun in the Ouémé region, and has lived in Womey with her family for twelve years. She is married to a mechanic called Paulin with whom she has four children who all attend school. Sylvie and her husband see to their family's needs together. Sylvie left school after second grade. For the past three years, she has sold sauces, condiments, drinks and fabric from her shop situated at her home. This business enables her to generate revenues which help her to see to her family's needs. She buys her products from Dantokpa, Benin's international market. This loan will enable Sylvie and her group to boost their business and grow their customer base and revenue.

loans.use: to purchase cans of drinks and condiments

loans.name: Thomas Amadu's Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva in Makeni, Northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you teachers from the SDA Primary School, located in Matotoka village, near Magburaka town, in Northern Sierra Leone. SDA Primary School was founded in 1975 by the Seven Day Adventist (SDA) Mission. The school currently has a staff of 12 dedicated teachers and an enrollment of 450 pupils. 

Thomas A. S. is a teacher at the school and leader of this group of borrowers. The 37-year-old Thomas has been in the teaching profession for 17 years now. A native of Merica-Makump village, Thomas is married to a trader and the couple has three children:  two in primary school and one in secondary school. Thomas has requested this loan in order to buy household furniture like a television set. 

Staff from this institution, like many other school's staff within SMT’s operational areas, come to SMT to apply for loans. At the end of each month, these teachers can repay the loan out of their monthly salaries. The institution’s bursar is directly responsible for deducting the repayment and pays SMT on their behalf.

loans.use: to buy household furniture like a television set.

loans.name: Lucienne

texts.fr: Née le 12 Janvier 1959 à Ouidah, ville historique du Bénin, Lucienne est mère de trois enfants, tous scolarisés et encore à sa charge. Lucienne est une veuve. Il y a près de vingt huit ans que Lucienne s’est installée au quartier Cocotomey (dans la commune d’Abomey Calavi), où elle vit avec ses enfants. Lucienne n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Pour assurer ses besoins et prendre en charge les divers besoins de ses enfants, Lucienne vend des sacs de charbon d bois et aussi du maïs. Lucienne s’approvisionne à Kpassè et à Parakou dans le Nord du Bénin. Mais Lucienne vend ses produits à son domicile et les livre également aux revendeurs à Dantokpa, marché international du Bénin. Lucienne exerce cette activité depuis huit ans. En vue de rehausser le niveau de son activité, Lucienne  sollicite un troisième auprès de ALIDé. Lucienne a bien remboursé les deux premiers crédits obtenus.
texts.en: Born on the 12th January, 1959 in Ouidah, an historical town in Benin, Lucienne is a mother of three children who attend school.  Lucienne is a widow. She has lived in the Cocotomey quarter (in the Abomey Calavi region) for 28 years, where she now lives with her children. Lucienne never went to school. In order to meet her family's needs, Lucienne sells wood coal and corn for a living. Lucienne sources her goods from Kpassè and Parakou in the north of Benin. Lucienne sells her products from home and also delivers to re-sellers in Dantokpa, Benin's international market. Lucienne has worked in this field for eight years. In order to boost her business, Lucienne has succesfully repaid her two first loans.

loans.use: to purchase bags of wood coal and corn

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a dairy cow and a poultry unit

loans.name: Virginie

texts.fr: Virginie est née en 1986 à Dogbo (au Mono) et est marié à un revendeur du nom de Chadas. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés et vivant à leur charge. Il y a environs sept ans que la famille s’est installée à Cocotomey dans la commune d’Abomey Calavi. Virginie vient en aide à son mari en supportant avec lui les diverses charges familiales. Depuis cinq ans, Virginie mène comme activité la vente de seaux, de glacières et divers autres ustensiles de cuisine en plastique à Cocotomey. Par contre Virginie achète ses produits à Dantokpa, marché international du Bénin. C’est la troisième fois que Virginie sollicite auprès de ALIDé un crédit, crédit qui lui servira à élever le niveau de son activité et à mieux satisfaire sa clientèle. Les crédits antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Virginie was born in 1986 in Dogbo (in Mono). She is married to a wholesaler by the name of Chadas. They have two dependent children in school. About seven years ago, the family settled in Cocotomey, in the community of Abomey Calavi. Virginie helps her husband provide for different family expenses. Since about five years ago, Virginie sells buckets, ice chests and other plastic household goods in Cocotomey. She stocks up in Dantokpa, at the international market of Benin. This is the third time that Virginie is seeking a loan from ALIDé, which will allow her to expand the scope of her business and better respond to her customers’ needs. The prior loans have been well repaid.

loans.use: to buy two dozens of various plastic goods and half a dozen ice chests

loans.name: Séraphine

texts.fr: Née en 1966 à Dogbo au Bénin, Séraphine a cinq enfants à sa charge, dont quatre sont ses propres enfants. Tous les enfants sont scolarisés et vivent ensemble avec Séraphine. Séraphine est une veuve. Il y a environs quinze ans que Séraphine vit au quartier Cocotomey dans la commune d’Abomey Calavi avec ses enfants. Seule Séraphine assure les divers besoins de ses enfants. Pour y arriver, Séraphine achète des produits vivriers (maïs, haricot, farine de manioc, etc.), qu’elle vend à son domicile et au marché de Cococodji . C’est aux marchés de Dogbo et de Azovè que Séraphine s’approvisionne. Séraphine exerce cette activité depuis une dizaine d’année.  Dans le but de rehausser son activité et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Séraphine sollicite auprès de ALIDé un troisième prêt. Séraphine avait obtenu antérieurement deux crédits qui ont été tous bien remboursés.
texts.en: Born in Dogbo, Benin in 1966, Séraphine has five children under her care, four of whom are her own. All of the children go to school and live together with Séraphine, who is a widow. Séraphine has been living in the Cocotomey neighborhood in the town of Abomey Calavi with her children for about the past fifteen years. Séraphine alone sees to the various needs of her children. In order to do so, Séraphine buys products for food production (corn, beans, cassava flour, etc.), which she sells from her home and the market in Cococodji. It's at the Dogbo and Azovè markets that Séraphine finds her supplies. Séraphine has been running this business for some ten years. With the goals of increasing her business and of better responding to her customers' level of demand, Séraphine is seeking a third loan from Alidé. Séraphine has previously secured two loans, both of which have been properly repaid.

loans.use: to buy 3 sacks of corn, 2 sacks of beans and 3 sacks of cassava flour.

loans.name: Sang De Jesus Group

texts.fr: Le groupe SANG DE JESUS  est composé de deux personnes qui vivent toutes les deux dans le même quartier à Kowégbo à Cotonou.  C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Sèdé Victorine est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Sèdé Victorine est née le 24 Février 1974 à Porto-Novo, capitale politique du Bénin. Sèdé Victorine est mariée à un certain Thierry et a trois enfants, tous scolarisés. En plus de leurs enfants, le couple a deux autres enfants à charge. Sèdé Victorine et son mari assurent ensemble les différentes charges de la famille. Depuis près de six ans, Sèdé Victorine vit à Kowégbo avec son mari et ses enfants. Afin de se prendre en charge et d'améliorer son niveau de vie, Sèdé Victorine exerce depuis huit ans environs, comme activité la vente de chaussures et de mêches dans sa boutique size à Sodjeatimey. C’est à Lomé au Togo, mais aussi à dantokpa, marché international du Bénin, que Sèdé Victorine achète ses produits. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son revenu, Sèdé Victorine sollicite, ensemble avec son groupe, un autre crédit. Son ambition est de construire plus tard sa propre maison.
texts.en: SANG DE JESUS (Jesus Blood) is a group composed of 2 people who both live in Kowégbo, a neighborhood of Cotonou, Bénin. This is the second time that this group requests a loan from ALIDé, in order to increase their business. The group representative, Sèdé Victorine, is the one raising her hand on the picture. Sèdé Victorine was born on February 24th 1974 in Porto-Novo, the political capital of Bénin. She is married to a man called Thierry. They have 3 children who all go to school. In addition to their own children, they take care of two other children. Sèdé Victorine and her husband both take care of the family financially. Sèdé Victorine has been living in Kowégbo for about 6 years with her husband and her children. In order to take care of her family and to raise their standard of living, Sèdé Victorine has been selling shoes and hair weaves in her shop in Sodjeatimey for about 8 years. It's in Lomé, Togo, and also in Dantokpa, an international market in Bénin, that Victorine purchases those items. In order to meet the needs of her customers and to increase her income, Victorine, along with her group, is requesting another loan. Her ambition is to have her own house built in the future.

loans.use: to buy shoes and hair weaves.

loans.name: Ikusasalethu Group

texts.en:
Ningeleni is 52 years old and widowed, with 3 children aged between 23 and 30. She is running a small retail business in Mandini, South Africa. She has been in this business for 6 months. She has no other source of income. She is wearing a white top standing on the left side of her group in the photo above.

She has 2 employees for her business. She requested this loan through WDB and Kiva to buy fruit, cakes, juices, snacks, sweets, cold drinks, maize meal and bread. The main challenge to her business is that she has no transport of her own to go and make orders. In five years time she would like to have her own supermarket.The extra income from this loan will help her renovate her house.

loans.use: To buy fruits, cooking oil, cakes, juices, snacks, sweets, cold drinks, sugar, breads and maize meal.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Hope Development Group

texts.en: 34 year old K. Mujibu is a charcoal salesman in Kisenyi, Kampala. The happily married father of 4 has been operating this business for the last 10 years, before which he was mostly doing odd jobs in and around Kampala.   He says his weekly business profits are about 150,000 shillings, and adds that with this loan, he will purchase more bags of charcoal to resell.  Mujibu also has a rental business that he oversees. Through the course of the years he says he has relied on one thing, which is hard work. This hard work ethic has sustained him this long, and he anticipates that if he keeps going with that tenacity, his further longevity will be guaranteed.

loans.use: to purchase more bags of charcoal to resell

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se llama RENACER; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Distrito de Huanchac, perteneciente a la Provincia y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Martha, la socia tiene 49 años de edad, la socia es soltera y tiene una hija de 26 años de edad, la socia alterna sus actividades con la compra y venta de cosméticos, la socia lleva sus catálogos a las instituciones públicas y privadas y ofrece sus productos que consisten en la venta de shampoo, cremas, colonias, maquillajes, bisutería en general. La socia requiere el préstamo a razón de tener un capital de trabajo para poder pagar los pedido y esperar a que sus clientes le den en partes una ves que el producto llegue, la socia es una mujer muy activa y trabajadora, ella desea lo mejor para su hija y es por eso que sigue adelante con su pequeña empresa. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de cosméticos, cremas y productos de belleza para la venta. 

La socia se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called RENACER and is located in the Huanchac district, part of the province and department of Cusco.

Martha is 49 years old and single, with a 26 year old daughter.  She buys and sells cosmetics by showing her catalogs at public and private institutions.  Her products include shampoo, creams, colognes, makeup, and general costume jewelry.   She needs this loan to increase her working capital to be able to pay for orders and later collect from her customers.

Martha is very hard working and active person who wants the best for her daughter, so she continues ahead with her small company.  She is very grateful and promises to be disciplined about making her payments.

loans.use: to pay for orders and later collect from her customers

loans.name: Sisanda Group

texts.en:
Tamsanqa, 42 years of age, is married with 3 children, aged between 6 and 20, two of whom attend school. She also takes care of two other relatives that live with her. In addition to her business, Tamsanqa has another source of income, the government’s child support grant.

Tamsanqa has been in business for 6 months, selling clothes and cold drinks at pay points in Mandini, South Africa. She has requested this loan through WDB and Kiva to buy clothes and cold drinks. The main challenge in her business is that customers buy on credit and fail to pay on time. In five years time, Tamsanqa would like to have a proper place for her business and have more employees. The extra income from this loan will help her pay for tertiary education for her children. In the photo, Tamsanqa is wearing a yellow top.

loans.use: to buy clothes and bags.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se llama RENACER; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Distrito de Huanchac, perteneciente a la Provincia y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Vilma, la socia tiene 38 años de edad, la socia es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos de 6 años y 6 meses el menor, la socia trabaja de manera independiente la compra y vende zapatos y zapatillas por catálogos a las diferentes instituciones públicas y privadas ella deja sus catalogos y en dos días los recoge y con los pedidos ingresa a su empresa a hacer los pedidos y en 2 semanas le están entregando los pedidos y ella los reparte a los diferentes clientes y pasa a recoger el dinero que es el pago de estos en 2 semanas más. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir como capital de su negocio.

La socia se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The communal bank is called RENACER (To be Reborn) and is located in Huanchac District which belongs to La Provincia, Cusco Department.

The member is Vilma, 38.  She has a spouse and two children who are 6 years and two months old respectively.  She works independently selling shoes and sandals via catalogue to various private and public institutions.  She drops off the catalogues and two days later returns to take orders which she places with her firm.  Two weeks later her orders are delivered and she takes them to her various customers and collects payment for them two weeks after that.  She is asking for a loan to invest as capital in her business.

She is grateful and wants to express that she will be very disciplined with her payments.

loans.use: to buy shoes and sandals.

loans.name: Jhon

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se llama RENACER; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Distrito de Huanchac, perteneciente a la Provincia y Departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr: Jhon, el socio tiene 34 años de edad, el socio es separado y tiene 2 hijos de 14 y 10 años de edad, el socio trabaja como artesano y su especialidad es trabajos en melanina, el realiza muebles a pedidos y los expone en la plaza Tupac Amaru los días sábados y domingos, esta es una feria en la que se expone todo tipo de arte y comidas, el socio requiere l préstamo para invertir en la compra de herramientas, materiales para la venta de muebles.

El socio se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The communal bank is called RENACER (To be Reborn) and is located in Huanchac District which belongs to La Provincia, Cusco Department.

The member is Jhon, 34.  He’s separated and has two children who are 14 and 10 years old.  He works as a craftsman and his specialty is making things out of melamine; he makes furniture to order and displays them in the Tupac Amaru Square on Saturdays and Sundays.  This is a market where all sorts of food and crafts are displayed.  The member needs a loan to buy tools and supplies for his furniture sales.

He is grateful and wishes to express that he will repay in a disciplined way.

loans.use: to buy tools and supplies.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se llama RENACER; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Distrito de Huanchac, perteneciente a la Provincia y Departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra: Victoria, la socia tiene 38 años de edad y es casada la socia tiene 1 hijo de 18 años de edad, la socia es consultora de cosméticos ella trabaja desde hace 3 años en la promoción y exposición de catalogos y venta de cosméticos, la empresa de la socia le permite manejar sus horarios según a su disponibilidad de tiempo, la socia requiere este crédito para poder capitalizarse, ella pagara el total de los pedidos y esperar a que su cliente paguen en dos partes, para así ella recuperar lo anticipado de dinero que ella dio, la socia también desea invertir parte del crédito en la matricula de su hijo que estudia en la ciudad e Lima. La socia requiere el préstamo para poder invertir en la compra de productos por catalogo y en la matricula de su hijo.

La socia se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The communal bank is called RENACER (To be Reborn) and is located in Huanchac District which belongs to La Provincia, Cusco Department.

The member is Victoria, 38.  She’s married and has an 18-year-old son.  She is a Beauty Consultant and has been working for the last 3 years demonstrating and selling catalogue cosmetics.  The firm she works with allows her to set her own work schedules according to her time availability.

She needs this loan to capitalize herself so that she can recuperate the investment she made up front.  She will pay off her entire order and then wait for her customers to pay her in two installments.  She will also use part of the loan to pay her son’s tuition; he’s studying in the city of Lima.  She needs the loan to buy catalogue items and for her son’s tuition.

She is grateful and wants to express that she will repay in a disciplined way.

loans.use: to buy catalogue items and to pay for her son's tuition.

loans.name: Zoila

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se llama RENACER; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Distrito de Huanchac, perteneciente a la Provincia y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Zoila, la socia tiene 49 años de edad, la socia es soltera y tiene una hija; la socia trabaja desde hace 3 años en la venta de productos por catalogo, la socia vende productos de belleza, cremas, colonias, bisutería entre otros, ella es docente de profesión y es una mujer muy emprendedora y llena de vida, la socia requiere el préstamo para poder invertir en la compra de productos ella pagara el total y una vez que las clientes le cancelen ella puede estar satisfecha, la socia también es docente así que puede ir pagando poco a poco sus deudas ya que estas le servirán para tener su capital de trabajo alterno. La socia solicita el crédito para capitalizarse.

La socia se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The communal bank is called RENACER (To be Reborn) and is located in Huanchac District which belongs to Cusco Province, Cusco Department.

The member is Zoila, 49.  She’s single and has a daughter.  She’s worked for the last three years selling items via catalogue.  She sells beauty products, creams, colognes and costume jewelry, among others.  She is a Teacher by profession and a very enterprising woman who is full of life.

She needs the loan to buy products.  She will pay off her entire order and once customers pay her she will be satisfied.  She is also a Teacher so will be able to repay her debts gradually which will help her have alternative working capital.  She is asking for the loan to capitalize herself.

She is grateful and expresses that she will be disciplined with her repayments.

loans.use: to buy beauty supplies.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se llama RENACER; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Distrito de Huanchac, perteneciente a la Provincia y Departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr: Juan Carlos, el socio 31 años de edad; el socio es soltero, el socio trabaja desde hace 4 años atrás confeccionando muebles en melanina, el socio es carpintero y su especialidad es trabajar con melanina realizando diferentes muebles a pedido, el socio tiene su stand en la plaza Tupac Amaru y los días de feria que son los sábados y domingos el socio expone su trabajo. El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar herramientas para elaborar sus muebles.

El socio se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The communal bank is called RENACER (To Be Reborn) and is located in Huanchac District belonging to Cusco Province and Department.

The member is Juan Carlos, 31.  He’s single and has worked making melamine furniture for the last four years.  He’s a carpenter and his specialty is working with melamine making furniture to order.  He has a stand in the Tupac Amaru Square and on market days, Saturday and Sunday, he displays his work.  He is asking for the loan to buy work tools to make his furniture.

He is grateful and wishes to express that he will repay in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy furniture making tools.

loans.name: Jend Ak Caay Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité Jend ak caay est composé de 13 femmes qui sont parentes et habitent le même village. Il est créé le 9 avril 2011 jour de l'inauguration du Banc Villageois de Keur Diawly. La principale activité est la transformation artisanale d'huile d'arachide.
Adama S. la responsable est mariée avec 5 enfants en charge, elle est âgée de 37 ans; elle est debout couverte en châle rose à droite sur la photo. Elle mène une activité de petit commerce d'huile d'arachide et de poisson. Elle a une bonne expérience
Son prêt lui permettra de renforcer son activité 
Elle participe aux dépenses de la famille pour soutenir son mari
texts.en:
The Jend ak caay solidarity group is composed of 13 related women living in the same village. It was created April 9th, 2011 - the day of the Keur Diawly "Banc Villageois" (loan group) inauguration. Their main activity is the manual processing of peanut oil.
Adama S., the group leader, is married with five dependent children. She is 37 years old. She is standing on the right of the picture, wrapped in a pink scarf. She manages a small retail business in peanut oil and fish. She is quite experienced.
The loan will make it possible for her to strengthen her business.
She takes part to the family's expenses to support her husband.

loans.use: to purchase peanuts and fish for resale.

loans.name: Yenniffer Katherine

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se llama RENACER; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Distrito de Huanchac, perteneciente a la Provincia y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Katherine, A la socia le llaman de su segundo nombre; La socia tiene 29 años de edad y es soltera, ella estudio la carrera de Antropología en la universidad y alterna sus actividades con un pequeño negocio que tiene en la galería de la plaza principal en la ciudad del Cusco, la socia esta vendiendo joyas y también trabaja en una institución pública, ella tiene como altividad alterna la venta de joyas, la socia es una joven muy risueña y tiene muchos bellos sueños, ella está trabajando mucho para seguir saliendo adelante. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de bisutería y venta de joyas, ella apoya tambiéna su mamá con los productos de belleza por catalogo.

La socia se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The communal bank is called RENACER (To Be Reborn) and is located in Huanchac District belonging to Cusco Province and Department.

The member is Katherine, 29.  She is single and studied Anthropology at the university.  She alternates her daily chores with a small business she has in a galleria in Cusco’s main square.  She carries jewelry and 100% Alpaca wool items.

She is a very cheerful young woman who has many beautiful dreams.  She is working hard to get continue to get ahead.  She is asking for the loan to invest in the purchase of jewelry and jewelry sales. She also supports her mother by selling beauty products from a catalog. 

She is grateful and wants to express that she will be very disciplined with her repayments.

loans.use: to purchase jewelry for resale

loans.name: Maria Antonieta

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se llama RENACER; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Distrito de Huanchac, perteneciente a la Provincia y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Maria, la socia tiene 29 años de edad, la socia es soltera y alterna sus actividades con el trabajo de personal de confianza en una joyería en un distinguido local en la plaza principal de la ciudad del Cusco, la socia desea el crédito para uso personal, ella prefiere no revelar el proyecto que tiene en mente por una cuestión de cábala. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en un gasto personal.

La socia se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The "Renacer" ("Rebirth") communal bank is located in the district of Huanchac, which is part of the province and department of Cusco. This borrower is Ms. Maria, who is 29 years old. She is single and divides her time between her daily activities and her work as a trusted employee at a jewelery store in a distinguished location in Cusco's main plaza. Maria would like a loan for personal use. For superstitious reasons, she prefers to not disclose the project that she has in mind. However, she is requesting the loan to invest in a personal expense.

Maria is grateful and wishes to convey that she will comply with her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: with a personal expense

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “ PRO DESARROLLO”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Poblado de Pisac, perteneciente a la Provincia de Calca, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Alicia, ella tiene 29 años la socia es conviviente, ella tiene 2 hijos de 9 y 6 años de edad, la socia tiene un restaurante con su tia, pero la socia también alterna esta actividad con sus tienda de abarrotes, la socia es nueva en el banco comunal su tia la invito a formar parte de este grupo y los otros miembros la aceptaron porque ella es una mujer responsable y muy trabajadora. La socia desea el crédito para poder implementar su tienda con productos de primera necesidad al por mayor y también el restaurante como las dos trabajan en sociedad deben invertir a la mitad en el mismo. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en sus negocios.

La socia se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The communal bank is called “PRO DESARROLLO” and is located in the town of Pisac belonging to Calca Province, Cusco Department.

Alicia, 29, is the member.  She has a spouse and two children who are 9 and 6 years of age.  She runs a restaurant with her aunt but she also alternates this activity with running a grocery store.  She is new to the communal bank; her aunt invited her to be part of this group and the other members accepted her because she’s a responsible, hard working woman.

She wants the loan to buy basic need items for her store at wholesale and also for the restaurant since they both work in partnership and have to invest half in it.  She wants the loan to invest in her businesses.

She is grateful and expresses that she will meet her repayment obligations in a disciplined way.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her store and invest in her restaurant.

loans.name: Eulalia

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “PRO DESARROLLO”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Poblado de Pisac, perteneciente a la Provincia de Calca, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Eulalia, ella tiene 35 años de edad y la socia es casada, la socia tiene 3 hijos de 15, 7, 3 y la socia se encuentra esperando un bebe; la socia por el momento se encuentra vendiendo verduras en el mercado, la socia compra al por mayor de los proveedores las verduras y ella los limpia, lava las verduras una por una sacando la tierra de ellas y lleva a vender al mercado. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de verduras.

La socia se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The communal bank is called “PRO DESARROLLO” and is located in the town of Pisac belonging to Calca Province, Cusco Department.

Eulalia, 35, is the member.  She’s married and has three children who are 15, 7 and 3 years of age.  She is expecting a baby.  For the moment she’s selling vegetables in the market.  She buys at wholesale from suppliers, cleans them and takes them to sell at the market.  She is asking for the loan to buy vegetables.

She is grateful and expresses that she will meet her repayment obligations in a disciplined way.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: Nanu Juboo Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité NANU JUBOO est créé le 26 Mai 2001. Il est composé de 09 femmes qui habitent toutes le même village. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce

Madame Fatou Mané à gauche de la photo et levant la main est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 49 ans. Elle est veuve et mère de huit enfant.  

Elle fait un petit commerce d'huile de palme et de balais. Et comme activité parallèle elle fait la vente de crème et de glace.

Le prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et d'augmenter afin d'augmenter son niveau d'approvisionnement

Son objectif est de subvenir à ses besoins personnels et à prendre en charge ses enfants
texts.en:
The solidarity group NANU JUBOO was created on May 26, 2001. It is composed of nine women who all live in the same village. Their principal work is in small-scale commerce.

Ms. Fatou Mané (at the left in the photo with her hand raised) is the head of the group. She is 49 years old, a widow, and the mother of eight children. She has a small-scale business involving palm oil and brooms. As a side business, she sells cream and ice. 

The loan will enable her to bolster her capital, so as to increase her supply volume. Her goal is to meet her personal needs and to support her children.

loans.use: to buy palm oil and some brooms

loans.name: Fortunata

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “ PRO DESARROLLO”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Poblado de Pisac, perteneciente a la Provincia de Calca, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Fortunata, ella tiene 32 años de edad y es soltera, la socia trabaja con su amiga vendiendo verduras, la socia compra de los proveedores al por mayor las diferentes verduras y las lleva a vender al mercado, la socia desea el crédito para invertir en la compra de verduras para su negocio.

La socia se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The communal bank is called “PRO DESARROLLO” and is located in the town of Pisac belonging to Calca Province, Cusco Department.

Fortunata, 32, is the member.  She is single and works with a friend selling vegetables.  She buys the various vegetables at wholesale from suppliers and then takes them to sell at market.  She wants the loan to buy vegetables for her business.

She is grateful and expresses that she will meet her repayment obligations in a disciplined way.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “PRO DESARROLLO”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Poblado de Pisac, perteneciente a la Provincia de Calca, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra.; Aurelia, ella tiene 36 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 15, 14, 8; la socia  se dedica  a la artesanía, la socia trabaja de forma independiente ella compra al por mayor artesanía y lo vende en el mercado artesanal también ella aprendió a realizar diferentes trabajos como bisutería y otros, la otra parte de su negocio está compuesto,artesanias compradas en el poblado al por mayor. La soica solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de artesania y materiales para realizar. 


La socia se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The communal bank is called “PRO DESARROLLO” and is located in the town of Pisac belonging to Calca Province, Cusco Department.

Aurelia, 36, is the member.  She’s married and has three children who are 15, 14 and 8 years of age.  She is a craftsperson.  She works independently.  She buys crafts at Wholesale and sells them at the crafts fair.  She also learned how to make various things like costume jewelry and others.  The other part of her business is composed of selling crafts bought at wholesale in town.  She is asking for the loan to buy crafts and crafts making supplies.

She is grateful and expresses that she will meet her repayment obligations in a disciplined way.

loans.use: to buy crafts and crafts making supplies.

loans.name: Kambeng Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité KAMBENG est créé le 26 Mai 2001. Il est composé de 6 femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Elles ont formé leur groupe par le lien de parenté et de voisinage. Leur activité principale est le maraichage et le petit commerce.

Madame Aramata M. debout à gauche de la photo emmitouflé d'une écharpe bleu est responsable du groupe. Elle est mariée et mère de 5 enfants. Elle a aussi la charge de 03 autres enfants qui lui sont confiés par des proches

Elle fait une activité de maraichage. Elle exploite à domicile un petit jardin de légumes. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine pour l'avoir pratiqué depuis environ 10 ans.

Son nouveau crédit lui permettra d'acheter des intrant agricoles pour faire son jardinage

Son objectifs est de soutenir son mari dans la prise en charge des besoins familiaux(scolarité des enfants, santé etc...)
texts.en:
The Kambeng solidarity group was created on May 26, 2001. It is composed of six women from the same neighborhood. They are relatives and neighbors who decided to form a group together. Their main line of work is market gardening and vending. 

Mrs. Aramata M., on the left in the photo wrapped in a blue scarf, is the group’s leader. She is married and the mother of five. She also has three other children in her care, entrusted to her by relatives.  Her business activity is marked gardening. She has a small vegetable garden by her house. She has lots of experience after having practiced gardening for about 10 years. Her new loan will allow her to buy agricultural inputs needed for gardening. Her goal is to help her husband provide for the family needs (her children’s education, healthcare, etc.).

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs for her vegetable garden

loans.name: Kadidja

texts.fr: Agée de 33ans, Mme Kadidja  est une jeune dame dynamique qui aime faire le commerce. Elle est mariée à un technicien et a 02 enfants en charge. Elle se donne à cette activité (vente de produits de beauté, pagnes, mèches) depuis 2000. Elle vend à toutes personnes, s’approvisionne à Lomé, à Cotonou (Capitale du Bénin) et revend dans sa boutique à Djidjolé.  Ce prêt lui servira à acheter 04 cartons de produits de beauté,  02 cartons de mèches et 04 pièces de pagnes pour revendre afin de satisfaire ses clients pour avoir de bénéfices.
texts.en: Kadidia is a dynamic young woman of 33 years old who likes trading. She is married to a technician and has two children in her care. She has devoted herself to this business (the sale of beauty products, pieces of highly colourful fabric known as "pagnes" and hair extensions) since 2000. She sells to all sorts of people, gets her supplies in Lomé and Cotonou (the economic capital of Benin) and resells them in her shop in Djidolé. This loan will be used to buy four cartons of beauty products, two cartons of hair extensions and four pieces of "pagne" fabric, in order to satisfy customer demand and make money.

loans.use: to buy beauty products, hair extensions and "pagnes"

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “PRO DESARROLLO”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Poblado de Pisac, perteneciente a la Provincia de Calca, Departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr: Alfredo, el socio tiene 44 años de edad, el socio tiene 3 hijos de 14, 12, 8 años de edad; el socio es chofer y cubre las rutas de Pisac a Calca y viceversa; el socio también se dedica a la ganadería, el socio tiene 20 vacas y ahora le gustaría compra un par mas de vacas dependiendo el tamaño dependerá el precio, el socio  es casado y junto a su esposa se dedican alternamente a la crianza y engorde de ganados, el socio desea el préstamo para invertir en la compra de vacas.

El socio se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The communal bank is called “PRO DESARROLLO” and is located in the town of Pisac belonging to Calca Province, Cusco Department.

Alfredo, 44, is the members.  He has three children who are 14, 12 and 8 years of age.  He’s a driver on the Pisac-Calca and vice versa route.  He also raises livestock.  He has twenty cows and he’d now like to buy another pair of cows; price will depend on their size.  He is married and together with his wife they share raising cattle.  He wants the loan to buy cows.

He is grateful and expresses that he will meet his repayment obligations in a disciplined way.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Julia Rosa

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “PRO DESARROLLO”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Poblado de Pisac, perteneciente a la Provincia de Calca, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Julia, ella tiene 36 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 15, 13, 9 años de edad; la socia se dedica al comercio minorista; ella vende emoliente y desayunos escolares de forma independiente; la socia compra insumos y todas las hierbas medicinales, la socia prepara todos los días diferentes hierbas hervidas y naturales llamados emolientes estos en realidad son infusiones o mates nativos usados para aliviar diferentes problemas de salud, desde una tos, hasta problemas con el hígado, riñones y otros. La socita solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de insumos para su negocio.

La socia se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The communal bank is called “PRO DESARROLLO” and is located in the town of Pisac belonging to Calca Province, Cusco Department.

Julia, 36, is the member.  She’s married and has three children who are 15, 13 and 9 years of age.  She is a retailer.  She sells emollients and school breakfasts independently.  She buys supplies and medicinal herbs and every day prepares various natural boiled herbs called “emolientes” which actually are infusions or native teas used to alleviate various health problems, everything from a cough to liver and kidney problems and others.  She needs the loan to buy supplies for her business.

She is grateful and expresses that she will meet her repayment obligations in a disciplined way.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Unidas Para Siempre Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "UNIDAS PARA SIEMPRE" porque como su nombre lo indica, para el grupo es importante mantenerse unido por mucho tiempo, lo cual se vea reflejado en cada prestamo que termine y se renueve sin problema alguno. Estan ubicados en Hidalgo, México. El grupo esta conformado por 12 integrantes. La señora Telma M.. Tiene 34 años, estudio hasta la secundaria, es comerciante y tiene 3 hijos 1 mujer y 2 varones. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos naturistas desde hace 2 años, teniendo a su cargo un club nutricional que ella misma inicio. Solicita el prestamo para invertir en mercancia (productos nutricionales), y de esta manera hacer crecer su negocio. Al solicitar el prestamo ella se siente entusiasmada ya que en base a esta oportunidad piensa hacer mayores inversiones, y de esta forma comenzar a tener más ganancias que le permitan tener una mejor calidad de vida y para su familia, debido a la gran demanda que tiene, piensa aperturar otro club de nutricion, además de que por sus altos indices de venta ya esta por obtener el 50% de descuento en sus compras por ser mayorista. Con las ganancias que obtenga quiere ahorrar para darles una carrera profesional a sus hijos para que logren sus sueños.
texts.en:
This group is called “UNIDAS PARA SIEMPRE” (Forever United) because, like the name indicates, for the group it’s important to stay together for a long time which will be reflected in each loan that is completed and renewed problem free.  They are located in the state of Hidalgo, México.  It has 12 members.

Mrs. Telma Martínez, 34, finished middle school, is a merchant and has three children, one girl and two boys.  She has sold natural products for two years.  She has a nutritional club that she herself started.  She is asking for a loan to invest in merchandise (nutritional products) in order to help her business grow.

She feels enthusiastic while requesting the loan because based on this opportunity she will make larger investments and begin to have profits that will allow her and her family to have a better quality of life. 

Because of the great demand she has she’s thought about starting another nutritional club.  In addition, because of the high sales she’s had she’s about to get a 50% discount on her purchases for being a wholesaler.  She wants to save her profits to provide her children with professional careers so that they will reach their dreams.

loans.use: to invest in nutritional products.

loans.name: Mukwano Kwagalana Development Group

texts.en: K. Ronald, 53 years old, has been in the brick sales business for 8 years, and the happily married father of 13 says he has no regrets about his decision to venture into this business from his first business - farming. With this business, which has called for constant diligence, he has managed to provide better welfare for his family. He operates his business from Kiira trading center, Kampala. The business generates 200,000 UGX as monthly profit. K. Ronald also operates a canteen in a nearby school. He plans to use this loan to buy a modern brick-making machine.

loans.use: to purchase a modern brick-making machine

loans.name: Kadiamor Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité de Kadiamor est créé le 26 Mai 2001. il est composé de sept femmes qui habitent le même village. Leur activité principal est le petit commerce. Le nom du groupe qui est un vocable Diola Signifiant entente. Le groupe fait du Banc Villageois de NIAGUIS NEMA

Madame Binta Sané qui est à gauche de la photo levant la main et la responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 56 ans. Elle est marié et mère de cinq enfants. Elle a aussi en charge quatre autres enfnats qui lui sont confiés par des proches.

Elle fait un petit commerce de légumes. Elle a une expérience avérée dans ce domaine. Elle dispose également d'un congélateur qui lui permet de faire parallèlement la vente de glace et de crème 

Le prêt lui permettra de mieux développer son activité. les profits qui seront générés lui permettront de soutenir son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes. En dehors des besoin familiaux les recettes lui serviront à augmenter son niveau d'épargne
texts.en:
The Kadiamor solidarity group was created on 26th May 2001 and is made up of seven women who live in the same village. They are mainly active in small trading businesses. The name of the group is a Diolan term meaning harmony. The group is part of the Banc Villageois in Niaguis Nema. 

Mrs. Binta Sané, who is on the left of the photo and raising her hand, is in charge of the group. She is 56 years old, married and mother to five children. She also takes care of four other children, who have been entrusted to her by relatives.

She has a small business selling vegetables and has a proven experience in this field. She also has a fridge which allows her to sell ice-cream and cream.

The loan will allow her to build up her business, and the profits which she will generate will mean that she can help her husband with the daily expenses. Apart from providing for her family's needs, her income will also allow her to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy vegetables

loans.name: Goya

texts.es:
Goya nació en la comunidad de Vilcabamba del distrito de Caicay de provincia  de la Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 40 años edad y tiene cuatro hijos, actualmente ella vive en la comunidad donde nació. 

Su actividad económica principal Goya es la agricultura y ganadería. Goya tiene varios terrenos de cultivo donde siembra papa y maíz, ella también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, gallinas de doble pechuga. Goya tiene una tienda de abarrotes donde vende comestibles como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos y otras cosas más.  Con su próximo préstamo, Goya una parte del crédito lo utilizara para comprar gallinas y para aumentar el capital del negocio de la tienda de abarrotes.

Goya pertenece al banco comunal “Mamacha del Carmen” de la Asociación Arariwa. El banco comunal esta en el tercer año de funcionamiento y les va muy bien.
texts.en:
Goya was born in the community of Vilcabamba in the Caicay district of Paucartambo province, in the department of Cusco.  She is 40 years old and has 4 children.  She is now living in the community where she was born.

Goya's main economic activity is farming and livestock.  She has some lands where she cultivates potatoes and corn, and she also raises small animals such as guinea pigs and broiler hens.  Goya also has a grocery store where she sells food such as rice, sugar, noodles and other products.  She will use part of this loan to buy hens and the other part to increase her working capital in her grocery store.  

Goya belongs to the communal bank "Mamacha del Carmen," in the Asociación Arariwa.  This communal bank is in its third year of operation, and is doing very well.

loans.use: to buy hens and also to increase the working capital in her grocery store business

loans.name: Elza

texts.es:
Elza nació en el distrito de Caicay de provincia  de la Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 55 años edad y tiene cuatro hijos, actualmente ella vive en la comunidad donde nació. Elza y su esposo Rómulo tienen un taller de estructuras metálicas y soldadura. Ya son tres años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que le pone en su trabajo. Con  su próximo préstamo, Elza requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo lijas, fierros, pintura, masilla, etc. 

Elza pertenece al banco comunal “Mamacha del Carmen” de la Asociación Arariwa. El banco comunal esta en el tercer año de funcionamiento y les va muy bien.
texts.en:
Elza was born in the district of Caicay, which is in the province of Paucartamvo in the department of Cusco. She is 55 years old, and has four children. At present, she lives in the community in which she was born. Elza and her husband Rómulo have a workshop for producing metallic structures and welding. They have spent three years dedicated to this business, and it has gone well thanks to the determination they put into their work. Elza needs this loan to buy materials, such as sandpaper, iron, paint, putty, etc. 

Elza belongs to the Mamacha del Carmen Community Bank, which is part of Asociación Arariwa. The community bank is three years old, and is doing well.

loans.use: to buy materials, such as sandpaper, iron, paint, putty, etc.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia nació en la comunidad Vilcabamba del distrito de Caicay de la provincia  de Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 55 años edad y tiene tres hijos, actualmente ella vive en la comunidad donde nació. Julia se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuy, gallina y otras animales, ella también se dedica a la ganadería y agricultura. Ya son cinco años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que le pone en su trabajo. Con su próximo préstamo, Julia requiere el préstamo para comprar animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes y gallinas. 

Julia pertenece al banco comunal “Mamacha del Carmen” de la Asociación Arariwa. El banco comunal esta en el tercer año de funcionamiento y les va muy bien.
texts.en:
Julia was born in the community of  Vilcabamba of the Caicay district of the province of  Paucartambo, departament of Cuzco. She is 55 years old and has three children. At present, she lives in the community where she was born. Julia raises small animals such as guinea pigs, hens, and other animals. She also works with cattle and farming. She has had this business for five years and it is going very well for her, thanks to the dedication she gives her work. With her next loan, Julia needs to buy small animals such as guinea pigs and hens.  

Julia belongs to the "Mamacha del Carmen” community bank of the Asociación Arariwa. The community banks is in its third year and it going very well.

loans.use: to buy small animals such as guinea pigs and hens.

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es:
Juan Francisco nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba del departamento del Cusco, él tiene 55 años edad y tiene tres hijos, actualmente él vive en la comunidad de Vilcabamba provincia de Paucartambo departamento del Cusco.

Juan Francisco se dedica a varias actividades como por ejemplo carpintería, gasfitería, agricultura, ganadería, panadería, comerciante y otras cosas más. Juan Francisco tiene un pequeño taller de carpintería en su domicilio donde elaborar muebles de madera como por ejemplo sillas, mesas, carpetas, roperos, etc. 

Juan Francisco desde muy niño aprendió el oficio de la carpintería pues su abuelo le enseño a fabricar muebles, él nos cuenta con mucha nostalgia que en el taller de su abuelo pintaba, lijaba, remozaba la madera. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que le pone en su trabajo. Con su próximo préstamo, Juan Francisco requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo madera. 

Juan Francisco pertenece al banco comunal “Mamacha del Carmen” de la Asociación Arariwa. El banco comunal esta en el tercer año de funcionamiento y les va muy bien.
texts.en:
Juan Francisco was born in the city of Quillabamba, in Cusco department.  He is 55 years old and has three children.  He currently lives in Vilcabamba community, in Paucartambo province, in Cusco department.

Juan Francisco engages in a number of business activities such as carpentry, plumbing, farming, livestock raising, bakery, sales and other things besides.  He has a small carpentry workshop in his home where he makes wooden furniture such as chairs, tables, desks, wardrobes, etc.

Juan Francisco learned the carpentry trade at a very young age as his grandfather taught him how to make furniture.  He tells us, with a lot of nostalgia, that he used to paint, file and renovate the wood in his grandfather's workshop.  He has been working in this business for several years and it is going very well thanks to the commitment that he puts into his work.  Juan Francisco would like this loan to buy materials such as wood.

Juan Francisco is a member of Asociación Arariwa's "Mamacha del Carmen" community bank.  The bank is in its third year and doing very well.

loans.use: to buy materials such as wood

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es:
Maria Dolores nació en la ciudad de Cusco del departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 50 años edad, tiene dos hijos varones y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. 

Maria Dolores tiene un fundo llamado “Vista Florida” donde produce maíz blanco. Maria Dolores trabaja desde el año 1987 en su fundo, Su fundo está ubicado en la comunidad de Vilcabamba y también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes y gallinas. Maria Dolores requiere el préstamo para comprar más animales menores cuyes. 

Maria Dolores pertenece al banco comunal “Mamacha del Carmen” de la Asociación Arariwa. El banco comunal esta en el tercer año de funcionamiento y les va muy bien.
texts.en:
Maria Dolores was born in the city of Cusco, in Cusco department.  She is 50 years old, has two sons, and lives in the city in which she was born.

Maria Dolores has a large farm called “Vista Florida” where she grows white corn.  She has been working on her farm since 1987.  It is located in Vilcabamba community and Maria Dolores also raises animals such as guinea pigs and hens.  She needs this loan to buy more animals (guinea pigs).

Maria Dolores is a member of Asociación Arariwa's “Mamacha del Carmen” community bank.  The bank is in its third year and is doing very well.

loans.use: to buy more animals (guinea pigs)

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Antonia nació en la comunidad de Vilcabamba del distrito de Caicay de la provincia de Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 45 años edad, tiene seis hijos varones y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. Antonia se dedica a la fabricación de adobes de barros para construcción de casas, ella tiene dos empleados quienes hacen a manos los adobes y ella vende a todos los pobladores de la comunidad y a otras regiones del departamento del Cusco. Ya son 10 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que realiza en su trabajo. Su actividad complementaria de Antonia es la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, gallinas y otros animales. Con el préstamo que Antonia va recibir, ella invertirá el dinero en la compra de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes y gallinas.

Antonia pertenece al banco comunal “Mamacha del Carmen” de la Asociación Arariwa. El banco comunal esta en el tercer año de funcionamiento y les va muy bien.
texts.en:
Antonia was born in Vilcabamba community, in Caicay district, in Paucartambo province, in Cusco department.  She is 45 years old, has six sons, and lives in the town where she was born.  

Antonia's business is making adobe bricks which are used in building houses.  She has two employees who make the bricks by hand and she sells her products to all the residents of her community as well as those in other regions of Cusco department.  Antonia has been in this business for 10 years and it is doing very well thanks to the commitment that she puts into her work.

Antonia also has a sideline business raising animals such as guinea pigs, hens and other animals.  Antonia will invest the loan that she is going to receive in buying animals such as guinea pigs and hens.

Antonia is a member of Asociación Arariwa's "Mamacha del Carmen" community bank.  The bank is in its third year and doing very well.

loans.use: to buy animals such as guinea pigs and hens

loans.name: Valeriana

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “ SEÑOR DE COYLLURITTI DE CCORAO”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Poblado de Ccorao - Pisac, perteneciente a la Provincia de Calca, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Valeriana, ella tiene 48 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 17 y 15 los menores y el hijo mayor es independiente; la socia vende cereales en el mercado  ella vende quinua, tarwi, trigo, y productos remojados, la socia vende una parte en el mercado de Huancaro en Cusco; la socia compra todos los productos de los proveedores mayoristas y los vende al por menor, la socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería al por mayor. 

La socia se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
This community bank is called “SEÑOR DE COYLLURITTI DE CCORAO” and is located in the village of Ccorao-Pisac, in Calca province, in Cusco department.

Valeriana is 48 years old, married, and has three children.  Her eldest is 17 and her youngest are 15.  Her eldest son lives independently.  Valeriana sells cereals in the market.  She sells quinoa, tarwi (lupin), wheat and reconstituted ('soaked') products.  She sells her products in Huancaro market, in Cusco.  She buys all her products from wholesalers and sells them retail.  She is requesting this loan to buy merchandise wholesale.

Valeriana is grateful for this loan and would like to make it known that she will make her loan repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy merchandise wholesale

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz Marina nació en la ciudad de San Sebastián de la provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 33 años edad, tiene seis hijos y vive en la comunidad de Vilcabamba (La comunidad de Vilcabamba se caracteriza por tener hermosos paisajes por ser una zona ganadera y agrícola, esta comunidad está ubicado a 35 minutos de la ciudad del Cusco.

Su actividad económica principal de Luz Marina es vender ropa y frazadas, ella viaja a diferentes poblados de la provincia de Paucartambo y ofrece sus productos a dueños de tiendas, a clientes específicos y a amigos. Ya son 15 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que realiza en su trabajo. Con el préstamo que Luz Marina va recibir, ella invertirá en la compra de ropa como por ejemplo pantalones.

Luz Marina pertenece al banco comunal “Mamacha del Carmen” de la Asociación Arariwa. El banco comunal esta en el tercer año de funcionamiento y les va muy bien.
texts.en:
Luz Marina, age 33, was born in the city of San Sebastián in the Cusco province which is part of the departmenf of Cusco. She has six children and lives in the Vilcabamba community.  Vilcabamba is known for its beautiful farming landscapes and is located 35 minutes from the city of Cusco.

Luz makes her living selling clothing and blankets; she travels to various settlements of the Paucartambo province and offers her merchandize to store owners, to specific clients, as well as to friends. She has been in this line of work for 15 years, and it has been working out quite well thanks to the effort Luz puts into her business. Luz plans to use the loan to purchase clothing inventory such as pants.

Luz is a member of the communal bank  “Mamacha del Carmen” which is part of the Asociación Arariwa. The communal bank is already in its third year, and it has been going very well.

loans.use: to purchase clothing inventory

loans.name: Los Angeles De Bomintzha Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama LOS ANGELES DE BOMINTZHA  debido a que la mayoria de sus integrantes son muy apagados a  cuestiones religiosas, para ellos un “angel” es aquel que cuida, protege y guia por el camino del bien, es por esta razón que decidieron llamarse así, la finalidad de ellos es cuidarse y protegerse unos a otros en los momentos dificiles por los que puedan pasar. Estan ubicados en Hidalgo, en México. El grupo esta conformado por 10 integrantes. La señora Juana G. H es integrante del grupo. Tiene 36 años, estudio hasta el bachillerato, es comerciante y tiene 3 hijos, 1 mujer y 2 varones. Ella tiene una tienda de abarrotes, negocio que inicio desde hace 3 años. Solicita el prestamo para invertir en mercancia  con los distintos proveedores que actualmente la atienden y de esta forma hacer crece su negocio. Al solicitar el prestamo ella se siente entusiasmada ya que en base al credito recibido piensa ampliar el local en donde se ubica su tienda debido a que la demanda que comienza a tener es cada dia mayor, asi como la exigencia en la variedad de productos por peticion de sus clientes, ya que de esta forma ella piensa obtener mayores ganancias que le permitan tener una mejor calidad de vida a ella y a toda su familia.
texts.en:
This group is called "Los Ángeles de Bomintzha" (The Angels of Bomintzha) because most of its members are very much devoted to religious matters.  For them, an 'angel' is someone who cares for people, protects them and guides them down the right path.  This is why they named their group as they did, as their goal is to care for and protect each other during difficult moments that they might experience.

The group is located in Hidalgo, in Mexico, and has 10 members.  Juana Gerrero H. is a member of the group.  She is 36 years old, studied up to senior high school, is a saleswoman, and has three children: 1 daughter and 2 sons.  She owns a grocery store which she set up three years ago.  Juana is requesting this loan to invest in buying merchandise from the different suppliers that she currently uses.  In this way, she will grow her business.

At the moment of requesting this loan, Juana feels excited because, on the basis of this loan, she is planning to expand her store premises.  She will do this because her customer demand is growing every day and her customers are requesting a greater variety of products.  In this way, Juana plans to make more profits which will enable herself and her whole family to enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in merchandise for her grocery store

loans.name: Maria Sergia

texts.es: La señora María se dedica a la elaboración y venta D. comida desD. hace ocho años, dicha actividad lo realiza en su domicilio cuenta con buena clientela ya que cerca D. su domicilio están ubicadas varias fabricas y hay gran afluencia D. personas por dicha zona, vive en domicilio propio junto a su esposo y sus dos hijas quienes le colaboran en la elaboración y venta D. comida, solicita el crédito para la ampliación D. su local y para comprar mas insumos para la venta D. comida, es una persona muy trabajadora se levanta desD. muy tempranas horas para la elaboración D. su comida, esta gradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Maria has been making and selling food for eight years.  She does this at her home.  She has a good amount of customers because her home is near various factories.  There is a great influx of people in her area.

She lives with her husband and her two daughters.  They help make and sell the food.

She is requesting the loan to expand her site and to buy more supplies for her food sales.  She is a very hard-working person.  She gets up very early in order to make her food.  

She is grateful to the institution for they support they have provided.

loans.use: to expand her site and to buy more supplies to make food.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “SEÑOR D. COYLLURITTI D. CCORAO”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Poblado D. Ccorao - Pisac, perteneciente a la Provincia D. Calca, Departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Manuela, La socia tiene 64 años, la socia es casada y tiene 6 hijos D. los cuales 5 son independientes y 1 tiene 28 años y la socia le apoya, la socia tiene su picantería, la socia también venD. comidas, extras, y bebidas frías; la socia requiere el prestamo para invertir en la compra D. bebidas para el local y D. insumos para su negocio.

La socia se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá D. manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos D. sus cuotas.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called “SEÑOR D. COYLLURITTI D. CCORAO” and is located in the village of Ccorao-Pisac, in Calca province, in Cusco department.

Manuela is a member of the communal bank.  She is 64 years old, married, and has six children.  Five of the children are independent.  She supports her 28 year old child.  Manuela has a restaurant.  She also sells food, extra dishes, and cold drinks.

She needs the loan to buy drinks and supplies for her business.

Manuela is grateful for this loan and would like to make it known that she will make her loan repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy drinks and supplies for her business.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
Gregoria nació en la comunidad de Vilcabamba distrito de Caicay de la provincia del Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 47 años edad, tiene cuatro hijos y vive en la comunidad de Vilcabamba. (La comunidad de Vilcabamba se caracteriza por tener hermosos paisajes por ser una zona ganadera y agrícola, esta comunidad está ubicado a 35 minutos de la ciudad del Cusco).

Su actividad económica principal de Gregoria tiene una chacra donde siembra maíz, papas y habas, ella también se dedica a la crianza de animales como por ejemplo vacas, chanchos, gallinas, conejos y cuyes. Su actividad económica complementaria es vender cerveza, gaseosas, chicha de jora, ella tiene una pequeña picantería en su domicilio donde expende sus productos. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que realiza en su trabajo. Con el préstamo que Gregoria va recibir, ella invertirá en la compra de cerveza y maíz para hacer jora. 

Gregoria pertenece al banco comunal “Mamacha del Carmen” de la Asociación Arariwa. El banco comunal esta en el tercer año de funcionamiento y les va muy bien.
texts.en:
Gregoria was born in the Vilcabamba district of Caicay in the Paucartambo province, Cusco department.  She is 47 years old and has four children.  She lives in the Vilcabamba community.  Vilcabamba is known for its beautiful scenery, its livestock, and its farming.  This community is located 35 minutes from the city of Cusco.

Gregoria’s main business activity is her farm.  She grows corn, potatoes, and beans.  She also raises animals like cows, pigs, chickens, rabbits, and guinea pigs.  

Her additional business activity is selling beer, soft drinks, and “chicha de jora” (a corn-based Peruvian beverage).  She has a small restaurant at her house where she sells her products.  She has had this business for several years.  It is going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her work.

Gregoria will use the loan she will receive to buy beer and corn for making jora.

Gregoria belongs to the Mamacha del Carmen Communal Bank of the Arariwa Asociación.  The communal bank is in its third year, and it is going very well for them.

loans.use: to buy beer and corn for making jora.

loans.name: Justina

texts.es:
Justina nació en la comunidad de Vilcabamba distrito de Caicay de la provincia del Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 44 años edad, tiene cuatro hijos y vive en la comunidad de Huambutio. (La comunidad de Huambutio se caracteriza por tener hermosos paisajes por ser una zona ganadera y agrícola, esta comunidad está ubicada a 30 minutos de la ciudad del Cusco).

Su actividad económica principal de Justina es hacer jora de maíz, ella tiene posos donde hace fermentar el maíz. Su actividad económica complementaria es la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes y gallinas, ella también tiene ganado como por ejemplo vacas, toros, caballos, etc.  Justina requiere el microcrédito para comprar de maíz, ella también va comprar animales como gallinas y cuyes. 

Justina pertenece al banco comunal “Mamacha del Carmen” de la Asociación Arariwa. El banco comunal esta en el tercer año de funcionamiento y les va muy bien.
texts.en:
Justina was born in Vilcabamba community, in Caicay district, in Paucartambo province, in Cusco department.  She is 44 years old, has four children, and lives in Huambutio community (Huambutio community is noted for its beautiful landscape, as well as its farming and livestock raising.  It is located 30 minutes from the city of Cusco).

Justina's main business activity is making 'jora de maíz' (a corn-based drink).  She has special wells where she ferments her corn.  She also has a sideline business which is raising animals such as guinea pigs and hens.  She also has livestock such as cows, bulls, horses, etc.  Justina needs this loan to buy corn.  She will also buy animals such as hens and guinea pigs.

Justina is a member of Asociación Arariwa's "Mamacha del Carmen" community bank.  The bank is in its third year and is doing very well.

loans.use: to buy animals such as guinea pigs and hens

loans.name: Justina

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “SEÑOR DE COYLLURITTI DE CCORAO”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Poblado de Ccorao - Pisac, perteneciente a la Provincia de Calca, Departamento de Cusco.
