In addition, Inés runs a 1.2 hectare plot of land together with her parents, on which they have mango and lemon plantations which they harvest every two weeks.  The plantations grow vigorously and are well developed.

Inés is requesting a loan for 2,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She will use this money to buy fertilizers and to weed her land in order to improve the production of her mango and lemon trees.  This will enable Inés and her parents to make more money so that they can improve the comfort of their home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to weed her land

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es:
Angelica es una persona soltera de 50 años de edad,  tiene casa propia que cuenta con todos los servicios básicos (agua, luz y desagüe),  la cual está ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo. Esta  zona se caracteriza por ser  muy comercial, turística y dedicarse a la agricultura en los distritos cercanos.

Angelica se dedica a vender comida en el mercado Modelo de la ciudad de Chiclayo, cuenta con un puesto propio donde su clientela  llega a degustar sus ricas comidas que prepara. Sus clientes son los mismos vendedores de dicho mercado, con  los ingresos que le genera la venta de su comida puede mejorar su calidad de vida.

Angelica ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles para mejorar su puesto de comida (comprando inmobiliario como: sillas, bancas y utensilios de cocina), quiere hacerlo un poco más grande ya que por la cantidad de clientela que tiene, desea brindarles  un mejor servicio y comodidad, permitiéndole  generar más ventas y poder solventar todas sus necesidades diarias.

Angelica es una mujer dedicada a su trabajo que con esfuerzo y empeño desea tener más adelante poder tener un restaurante grande y bonito.
texts.en:
Angelica is 50 years old and single.  She owns her own home which has basic services (water, electricity and sewerage) and is located in Chiclayo province.  This area is noted for being a very commercial area with a lot of tourism.  The residents of neighboring districts work in agriculture.

Angelica sells food in the Mercado Modelo market, in the city of Chiclayo.  She has her own stall where her customers come to taste the delicious food that she prepares.  Her customers are other market traders.  She uses the income from her food business to improve her quality of life.

Angelica has requested a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she can improve her food stall (buying furniture such as chairs, benches and also cooking utensils).  She would like to make her sales location a little larger so that she can provide her customers with a better service and greater comfort.  This will allow her to make more sales and cover all her daily needs.

Angelica is a woman who is committed to her work and she works with effort and dedication.  In the future, she would like to own a large and smart restaurant.

loans.use: to improve her food stall

loans.name: Estela

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “LAS EMPRENDEDORAS DE ANADAHUAYLILLAS”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Poblado de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la Provincia de Quispicanchis, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Estela, la socia tiene 54, La socia es casada, ella tiene 6 hijos de 34, 31, 30, 27, 21, 15 años de edad, la socia trabaja en la parroquia del pueblo, ella presta aquí sus servicios en el área de limpieza y alterna a esto la socia tiene sus terrenos de cultivo y siembra maíz y papa según la temporada, la socia también tiene una tienda de abarrotes, ella trabaja más de 21 años, la socia es una mujer religiosa y muy trabajadora, la socia requiere el préstamo para invertir en su tienda de abarrotes ella desea implementar dicha tienda con productos básicos y otros, la socia quiere comprar, arroz, azúcar, fideos, harinas, leche, ella trae desde Cusco que está situado a 1 hora desde este bello pueblo. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos para implementar su tienda de abarrotes.

La socia se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
This community bank is called “LAS EMPRENDEDORAS DE ANADAHUAYLILLAS” (The Entrepreneurs of Anadahuaylillas) and is located in the town of Anadahuaylillas, in Quispicanchis province, in Cusco department.

Estela is 54 years old, married, and has six children aged 34, 31, 30, 27, 21 and 15.  She works in the town's parish church where she provides cleaning services.  She alternates this work with farming her land.  Estela grows corn and potatoes according to the season.  She also owns a grocery store where she has worked for more than 21 years.  She is a religious and very hard-working woman.

Estela needs this loan to invest in her grocery store.  She would like to stock her store with basic products and other products.  She would like to buy rice, sugar, noodles, flour and milk.  She buys her products in Cusco which is one hour away from this beautiful town.  Estela is requesting this loan to invest in buying products with which to stock her grocery store.

Estela is grateful to be receiving the loan and would like to make it known that she will make her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in buying products with which to stock her grocery store

loans.name: Epifania

texts.es: Epifania, de 37 años, es una mujer muy amable y sencilla, vive en su casa propia junto a su querido hijo Wilson de 23 años y lo que más desea es trabajar muy duro para poder brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. Para Epifania el negocio de la costurería, es una actividad que le viene de familia, puesto que aprendió este arte de su madre cuando todavía era muy joven, su negocio es muy concurrido y sus clientes hacen cola para que les confeccione alguna funda de almohada, o cojines, que son las prendas que mejor le salen. Aunque tiene muchos clientes, ella trabaja sola, ya que sus ingresos económicos todavía no le permiten contratar a un ayudante, con el cual pueda acelerar la confección de los pedidos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es realizar el acabado a sus prendas, lleva 1 año en esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer todo el día elaborando telas, anhela que su negocio crezca con el tiempo y que se convierta en uno de los talleres de confección más reconocidos de su distrito. Este es el primer crédito con MFP y esta dispuesta a pagarlo puntualmente, ya que no desea tener problemas. Con los dos mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará nuevos materiales para la confección de sus prendas.
texts.en:
Epifania, age 37, is a very modest and kind woman.  She lives in her own house with her beloved son, 23 year old Wilson.  What she wishes for most of all is to work very hard in order to be able to give him a better quality of life.

Epifania’s business is sewing.  It is an activity that she got from her family.  She learned this art from her mother when she was still very young.  Her business is very busy, and her customers get in line to have her make a pillow case or cushions, which are the items that sell the best.

Even though she has a lot of customers, she works alone.  Her income still does not allow her to hire a helper who would be able to speed up making the orders.  What she likes best about her work is putting the finishing touches on her items.  She has been doing this business activity for one year.  She feels that the most difficult part is having to spend all day sewing.  She wants her business to grow in time; she wants it to become one of the best known sewing shops in her district.

This is her first loan with MFP.  She is prepared to make her payments on time because she does not want to have problems.  She will use the requested 2,500 soles to buy new materials for making her garments.

loans.use: to buy material to make her garments.

loans.name: Vicentina

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “LAS EMPRENDEDORAS DE ANADAHUAYLILLAS”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Poblado de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la Provincia de Quispicanchis, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Vicentina, la socia tiene  34 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 3 hijos la socia alterna su actividades del hogar con la artesanía, ella aprovecha del bello atractivo turístico que es la capilla Sixtina de Cusco y de las callecitas típicas del pueblo de Andahuaylillas para hacer de este una oportunidad de trabajo la socia vende artesanía que compra al por mayor  y ella vende en la plaza principal del pueblo a todos los turistas que viene a conocer su tierra. La socia requiere l crédito para invertir en la compra de artesanía al por mayor para la venta al por menor, La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de artesanía.

La socia se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
This communal bank is named “LAS EMPRENDEDORAS DE ANADAHUAYLILLAS” (The Entreprenuers of Andahuaylillas).  The bank is loacted in the town of Andahuaylillas, which belongs to Quispicanchis Province, Cusco Department.

The member is Sra. Vicentina.  She is 34 years old, married and has 3 children.  She divides her time between household duties and her handicraft business.  Sra. Vicentina takes advantage of both the beautiful tourist attraction, the chapel of Sixtina de Cusco, and the traditional alleyways of her town to find opportunities to work.  This member sells handicrafts, which she purchases wholesale, in the main square of the town to all the tourists who come to visit her land.  Sra. Vicentina  needs the loan to invest in the purchase of wholesale handicrafts, which she sells at retail.

The member is grateful and wants to express that she will be disciplined in the repayment of her loan.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of handicrafts.

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “LAS EMPRENDEDORAS DE ANADAHUAYLILLAS”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Poblado de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la Provincia de Quispicanchis, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Rosalia, la socia tiene 31 años de edad, la socia es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos de 13 y 5 años de edad; la socia se dedica a la crianza de animales menores ella cría cuyes y gallinas, la  socia vende estos animales a los restaurantes de la zona, ella requiere l crédito para poder comprar cuyes y gallinas y de este modo aumentar su negocio y poder mejorar su calidad de vida, la socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de animales como cuyes y gallinas.

La socia se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The community bank is called "THE ENTREPRENEURS OF ANADAHUAYLILLAS".  This bank is located in the town of Andahuaylillas, within the province of Quispicanchis and region of Cusco.

Ms. Rosalia is a 31 year old member.  She is married and has 2 children, ages 13 and 5. As a community member, she is engaged in raising small animals such as chickens and guinea pigs which she sells to local restaurants. She requires a loan to buy guinea pigs and chickens by which to increase her business and to improve their quality of life.  She is requesting a loan to purchase animals such as guinea pigs and chickens.

The [community bank] member is grateful and wishes to express her discipline with making the repayments.

loans.use: to purchase animals such as guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Maria Fany

texts.es:
María es una mujer soltera de 39 años de edad, tiene casa propia, contando con los servicios de agua luz solamente, la  casa está ubicada en el caserío Las Mónicas que pertenece al distrito de Tambogrande a una hora aproximadamente de la provincia de Piura.  Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y turismo.

La actividad que desarrolla María es ha la venta de productos de primera necesidad (venta de arroz, leche, aceite, azúcar, etc.), en su propio domicilio desde hace unos 4 años, al encontrarse su negocio en su casa puede atender a cualquier hora, lo que le permite diferenciarse de otras tiendas y así pueda obtener más ingresos para su uso personal.
El crédito solicitado por María a Edpyme Alternativa es de 1500 nuevos soles, el cual lo destinará para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería y poder ampliar su negocio con otros productos una vez que sus ventas aumenten.
El sueño de María es tener más adelante una tienda más grande que le genere mayores ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida y lo logrará con su trabajo y empeño.
texts.en:
María is 39 years old and single.  She owns her own home which only has running water and electricity.  It is located in the village of Las Mónicas, in Tambogrande district, approximately one hour from Piura province.  This is an area whose residents work in agriculture, livestock raising and tourism.

María sells essentials such as rice, milk, oil and sugar from her own home.  She has been in this business for four years.  As her business is located in her home, she is able to serve in it at any time which allows her to differentiate herself from other stores and thereby make more income for her personal use.

María is requesting a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which she will use to buy a larger quantity of merchandise.  She will then expand her business with other products once her sales increase.

María's dream for the future is to own a larger store which will make her more income so that she can improve her quality of life.  She will achieve this through her hard work and determination.

loans.use: to buy more products and expand her store

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “LAS EMPRENDEDORAS DE ANADAHUAYLILLAS”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Poblado de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la Provincia de Quispicanchis, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Gloria, la socia  tiene 25 años de3 edad; la socia es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos la socia trabaja desde hace 8 años vendiendo artesanía específicamente bisutería en la plaza central, a la socia también elabora tejas en piñipampa, la socia requiere el préstamo para poder comprar artesanía al por mayor y abastecerse para la temporada alta en el sector turismo. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertiré n la compra de artesanía para la venta.

La socia se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The "Las Emprendedoras de Andahuaylillas" ("The Entrepreneurs of Andahuaylillas") communal bank is situated in the village of Andahuaylillas, which belongs to Quispicanchis province, department of Cusco.

This borrower is Ms. Gloria. She is 25 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has three children, She has been working for eight years selling artisanal crafts, especially jewelery, in the central plaza. Gloria also knits in the area of Piñipampa, She is requesting this loan to buy crafts wholesale and to stock up for the tourist high-season. She will use this loan to buy artisanal crafts to sell.

Gloria is grateful and wishes to convey that she will be disciplined in her repayments.

loans.use: to purchase handicrafts to sell

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.es: Esperanza, de 54 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Víctor de 65 años y sus 2 hijos menores Mario de 22 e Isaac de 16 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Esperanza sabe que en estos tiempos conseguirá trabajo es muy complicado, por eso ha decidido incursionar en una actividad distinta, ella prepara comida y la vende, en forma ambulatoria en los mercados e instituciones del asentamiento humano Pachacutec, donde es muy querida y reconocida por los años que tiene trabajando en esta actividad. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es interactuar con sus clientes y ver que disfrutan de la comida que les preparó, lleva 15 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar la comida, puesto que es bastante lo que prepara. Con el tiempo, espera que su negocio crezca y pueda así mejorar sus ingresos económicos. Este es el séptimo crédito con MFP y al igual como hizo con los otros crédito espera pagarlo a tiempo. Con los tres mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más tapers para llevar a más personas la comida que prepara.
texts.en:
Esperanza is 54 years old.  She is a very kind and hard-working woman who lives in her own home together with her husband, 65 year-old Víctor, and her two dependent children, 22 year-old Mario and 16 year-old Isaac, who she would like to provide with a better quality of life.

Esperanza knows that it is very difficult to get a job these days.  For this reason, she decided to set up in her own business.  Esperanza prepares and sells food as an itinerant street vendor in markets and institutions in the Pachacutec settlement where she is very well liked and well known because she has been in this business for years.

What Esperanza most enjoys about her work is interacting with her customers and watching them enjoy the food that she has prepared.  She has been in this business for 15 years and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be transporting her food since she prepares quite a lot of it.  Over time, Esperanza hopes that her business will grow and that she will thereby be able to improve her income.

This is Esperanza's seventh loan from MFP and she hopes to repay it on time as she has done with all her previous loans.  She plans to use the 3,000 Peruvian soles she has requested to buy more plastic containers for distributing the food that she prepares to more people.

loans.use: to buy more plastic containers for the food that she prepares

loans.name: Adjovi

texts.fr: Mme Adjovi est mère de 02 enfants, mariée à un militaire, elle est âgée de 46ans et réside à Adidogomé (un quartier environ 09km de la ville de Lomé). Elle est dans cette activité (eau  minérale en sachet et  vente de jus de fruits) depuis 1981. Elle achète les matières premières à Lomé, à Kara (430km de Lomé) et à Bassar et revend après transformation en jus de bissap, citron, à toutes personnes et surtout aux écoliers. Elle veut ce premier prêt pour acheter 02 sacs de sucre, 06 sacs de bissap, et des sachets d’eau minérale. Elle a une ambition mettre les jus en bouteille plastique pour  revendre dans les autres pays.
texts.en: Mrs. Adjovi is a mother of two and married to a serviceman; she is 46 years old and resides in Adidogome (a neighborhood about five miles from the city of Lome). She has been in this business (pouches of mineral water and sale of fruit juice) since 1981. She purchases her ingredients in Lome, Kara (270 miles from Lome), and Bassar, and resells after transformation to "jus de bissap" (a hibiscus flower tea) with lemon to a variety of customers, mostly schoolchildren. She wants this first loan to purchase two bags of sugar, six bags of bissap, and mineral water pouches. Her ambition is to prepare juice in plastic bottles to resale in other countries.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, bissap (hibiscus flowers), lemons and pouches of mineral water

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca es una madre D. familia D. 54 años D. edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia que no cuenta con ningún servicio, ubicado en el caserío Guaraguaos a unos 10 minutos del distrito D. TambogranD., que se encuentra a  una hora D. distancia del departamento D. Piura.  Los pobladores D. esta zona se dedica a  la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Francisca  se dedica a la crianza, y venta  D. animales (ovejas, gallinas y  pavos), desD. hace 8 años, su corral lo tiene a unos minutos D. su casa. A sus animales los alimenta con comida  balanceada y una vez que llegan a su tamaño y peso ideal los venD. en el mercado del distrito D. TambogranD. o también  ha otros comerciantes. Sus ventas incrementará sus ingresos para cubrir todos sus gastos diarios.  Su esposo trabaja en las tierras D. cultivo D. otras personas para que tengan otro ingreso económico.

A solicitado  Francisca un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa D. 2000 nuevos soles para comprar  alimentos balanceados y  para la ampliación D. sus corrales por haber aumentado la cantidad D. sus animales.  La venta lo realizará  una vez que éstos  hayan alcanzado su desarrollo óptimo y pueda ofertarlos a los distintos comerciates aun buen precio.

Francisca  es una persona muy conocida en su caserío por sus ansias D. superación cada día y el tratar siempre que con su trabajo su familia se supere y mejore su calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
Francisca is a 54 year-old mother.  She lives with her husband and children in her own home which doesn't have any basic services.  Her home is located in the small village of Guaraguaos, ten minutes from TambogranD. district and one hour from Piura department.  The residents of this area work in agriculture and livestock raising.

Francisca raises and sells animals (sheep, hens and turkeys).  She has been doing this for eight years.  Her animal pens are located a few minutes from her home.  She feeds her animals with balanced animal feed and, once they have reached an ideal size and weight, she sells them in TambogranD. district market or to other salespeople.  Her sales cover her daily expenses.  Francisca's husband works on other people's land so that they have another source of income.

Francisca has requested a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy balanced animal feed and expand her pens as her number of animals has increased.  She will sell her animals once they have reached an optimum level of development and she will be able to sell them to different salespeople for a good price.

Francisca is very well known in her village for the fact that she is keen to improve herself every day and is always trying, through her work, to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy balanced animal feed and to expand her animal pens

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana, de 39 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo José de 65 años y sus 5 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar un mejor futuro. Ella tiene una renovadora de calzado, negocio que puso con su esposo ya que él tenía experiencia en este oficio, es así que ya son 17 años los que trabajan incansablemente durante todo el día para poder lograr los ingresos necesarios a su familia. A ellos les gusta mucho su trabajo ya que son personas que siempre han trabajado y por ende no se les hace complicado aunque muchas veces les resulta cansado, pero eso no hace que se den por vencidos sino todo lo contrario que trabajen mucho para conseguir sus tan ansiados sueños de poner una librería bazar por su domicilio ya que se esta empezando a hacer muy comercial, además de que cerca construirán hospitales por la zona, por lo que pronto será un lugar muy concurrido. Este es el décimo primer crédito con MFP, se siente muy feliz de haberlo obtenido y está dispuesta a pagar puntualmente. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará material para fabricar zapatos y así producir de mejor manera.
texts.en:
Juana is 39 years old.  She is a very humble and hard-working woman who lives in her own home together with her husband, 65 year-old José, and her five beloved children who she would like to provide with a better future.

Juana owns a cobbler's.  She set up her business together with her husband because he had experience in this trade.  They have now been working untiringly in this business for 17 years.  They work all day long in order to make the income they need for their family.  Juana and her husband enjoy their work a lot since they are people who have always worked and therefore it is not difficult for them, although it often proves tiring.  However, they do not give up.  On the contrary, they work hard in order to fulfill their dream of setting up a book store / general store in their home since their area is starting to become very commercial.  They are building hospitals nearby in the area and it will soon be a very busy place.

This is Juana's eleventh loan from MFP.  She feels very happy to have obtained it and is ready to make her repayments on time.  She will use the 2,000 Peruvian soles she has requested to buy materials for making shoes and thereby improve her production.

loans.use: to buy material to make footwear

loans.name: Ablavi

texts.fr: Mariée à un soudeur, Mme Ablavi a reçu une formation en menuiserie alumininium mais après son diplôme elle n’a pas eu la chance dans ce métier, pour se faire elle a opté pour une activité parallèle, celle de la vente des habits basins (tissus africains faits à la main par des femmes d’origine sahélienne). Elle  s’approvisionne au Mali et revend  à domicile à ses clientes. Elle a 02 enfants et aimerait aussi participer aux charges financière de la maison.et ce crédit lui permettra de se relancer dans la vie active.
texts.en: Married to a welder, Mrs. Ablavi has been trained as an aluminum furniture maker, but after receiving her diploma she has had no luck in that field. Therefore she chose a parallel activity, selling “bazins” outfits (African fabrics made by hand by women from the Sahel Region). She stocks up in Mali and resells to her clients out of her home. She has two children and would like to contribute to the family budget. This loan will  give a boost to her business activities.

loans.use: to buy traditional "bazins" fabrics

loans.name: Delia

texts.es:
Delia es una mujer soltera de 51 años de edad, tiene casa propia con los servicios de agua y luz, ubicada en nueva esperanza que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo, es una zona urbana.  Chiclayo se caracteriza por tener mucha actividad comercial, turismo y agricultura.
La actividad que realiza Delia  esa  la compra y venta de sandalias, cuenta con experiencia de 10 años en el negocio, ubicado en la parte exteriores del mercado modelo de la ciudad de Chiclayo. A pesar de la competencia que tiene trata de que con sus ingresos pueda cubrir sus necesidades,  pero a visto la oportunidad  de vender  otro tipo de productos (ropa), para seguir incrmentando sus ventas.
El préstamo solicitado por  Delia a Edpyme Alternativa mediante el capital Semilla es de 2000 nuevos soles, el cual será destinado  para la compra de sandalias y ropa.  Al contar con más variedad de productos  Delia está dispuesta a que su negocio sea más rentable y atractivo para el cliente.
Delia está dispuesta a que su negocio cresca cada vez más con su esfuerzo y dedicación, permitiéndole mejorar su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Delia is a single woman who is 51 years old. She has her own house with water and light service. It is located in Nueva Esperanza [New Hope], which belongs to the province of Chiclayo in an urban area. Chiclayo is characterized by having a lot of commercial activity, tourism, and agriculture.
Delia buys and sells sandals. She has ten years of experience in the business, which is located in the outer part of the model market in the city of Chiclayo. Despite the competition that she has, she tries to make sure that her income covers the cost of her necessities. But she has seen the opportunity to sell another kind of product (clothing) in order to continue increasing her sales.
The loan that Delia has asked for from Edpyme Alternativa by means of the capital Semilla is for 2,000 nevos soles, which will be used to purchase sandals and clothes. Since she will have more variety in products, Delia is determined that her business will be more profitable and attractive to customers.
Delia is determined that her business will grow more and more with her efforts and dedication, allowing her to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more sandals and clothes.

loans.name: Erick

texts.es: Erick es un joven emprendedor, tiene 24 años, es soltero y vive en casa de sus padres. Hace más de 1 año decidió tener su propia fuente de ingresos y es así que emprendió en la venta de prendas de vestir en las ferias comerciales. El tipo de prenda que ofrece va de acuerdo a la temporada, y cuando le hace falta más mercadería se va a la ciudad de Lima para conseguir el tipo de ropa que el cliente previamente le ha pedido. Sin embargo existe mucha competencia en su zona, pero ha logrado salir adelante. Una de la ventaja de su negocio es que ofrece  descuentos y ofertas, de esa manera ha logrado mantener a su clientela. Por ello anhela progresar en su negocio. Es su crédito número 5 con MFP, significa mucho para ser parte de un banco comunal porque le da un respaldo que necesita para crecer en su negocio y se compromete una vez más a seguir siendo puntual en sus pagos. Con el crédito, lo invertirá en la compra de más mercadería de temporada y de esa manera aumentar su capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Erick is an enterprising young man. He is 24 years old, single, and lives at home with his parents. More than a year ago, he decided that he wanted his own source of income. Therefore, he started selling clothes at the commercial fairs. The type of clothes he sells depends on the season. When he runs low on merchandise, he goes to the city of Lima to acquire the types of clothes his customers have previously requested. There is much competition in the area, but he has managed to succeed. The advantages of Erick’s business include the discounts and specials he offers. This strategy has helped him maintain his clientele. He hopes to make progress in his business.

This is his fifth loan with MFP. Being part of his Communal Bank has significant meaning to Erick because he receives the support he needs to grow his business. He promises to continue submitting his payments on time. With this loan, Erick will invest in the purchase of more season merchandise so that he can increase his operating capital.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy and sell drinks.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa es una madre D. familia D. 54 años D. edad, vive con sus  hijos y esposo en su casa propia la cual cuenta con los servicios básicos D. agua y luz, en su  acondicionado  un lugar para colocar su tienda, ubicado en e l la zona rural del caserío D. Ferreqafe  a unos 15 minutos del distrito D. Ferreñafe y a 20 minutos D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo.  Estas zonas se caracterizan por su alta actividad comercial, agricola, ganadera y turística  que desarrollan sus pobladores.

Rosa se dedica exclusivamente a su tienda, en cual sus  vecinos encuentran toda clase D. productos comestibles (leche, azúcar, arroz, azúcar, etc.), con su pequeño negocio que a colocado Rosa trata en lo posible D. brindar un mejor nivel D. vida para su familia.

Mediante una visita a Edpyme Alternativa Rosa trata D. adquirir un préstamo D. 1500 nuevos soles para abastecer su tienda D. más insumos y ampliarla para satisfacer las necesidades D. cus clientes, y D. paso incrementar  sus ingresos.

Rosa es conocida por sus vecinos, por ser una mujer  alegre, dispuesta a ayudar a otros y una madre responsable con elobjetivo D. que como familia salgan adelante apunta D. esfuerzo y trabajo.
texts.en:
Rosa is a 54-year-old mother who lives with her husband and children in their own home that receives basic services, such as water and electricity. In addition, it is well-suited for establishing her store. Rosa’s business is located in the rural section of the village of Ferreqafe, which is approximately 15 minutes away from the District of Ferreñafe and 20 minutes away from the city of Chiclayo. These areas are known for the high level of activity in the commercial, agricultural, livestock, and tourism sectors that employ their residents.

Rosa works exclusively in her store. Her neighbors are able to find all types of food products such as milk, sugar, rice, and other items. Through her business, Rosa tries to the best of her ability to proviD. her family with a better standard of living.

Upon visiting Edpyme Alternativa, Rosa requested a loan of 1500 PEN so that she could restock and expand her store with more inventory in order to satisfy the needs of her customers and increase her income.

Rosa is well-known among her neighbors for being a cheerful woman who is willing to help others as well as a responsible mother. Her goal is to move her family forward through hard work and effort.

loans.use: to acquire more merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Ayaba

texts.fr: Mère de 02 enfants Mme Ayaba est mariée à un commerçant. Elle a 37ans et a commencé le commerce de charbons, d’arachide, d’huile et de riz depuis 2003, ce prêt sera destiné à s’approvisionner en charbon de bois à ATAKPAME (une ville située a 160km de la ville de Lomé. Elle fait la revente de tous ses produits à domicile. Elle aimerait plus tard avoir un magasin pour son commerce.
texts.en: Ms. Ayaba is married to a merchant and has two children. She is 37 years old and started selling charcoal, peanuts, oil, and rice in 2003. This loan will be used to supply her with charcoal from Atakpame (a city located 160km from the town of Lomé). She re-sells all of her products at home. In the future, she would like to have a store in which to sell her goods.

loans.use: To buy and sell charcoal, rice, maize, and oil.

loans.name: Fiwavi

texts.fr: Couturière de profession, Mme fiwavi  à 36 ans ; mariée à un menuisier et mère de deux enfants. Dans son atelier dénommé « DON de DIEU » elle coud des habits qu’elle revend à sa clientèle, ce prêt va lui permettre de s’acheter une machine de broderie pour élargir sa clientèle et satisfaire la demande.car depuis 1994  date  a laquelle  elle a commencée cette activité ,sa  vie et celle du ménage ne s est pas améliorer selon ses espérances. Elle  a une ambition : devenir une grande couturière de renom.
texts.en: A dressmaker by profession, Ms. Fiwavi is 36 years old, married to a carpenter, and has two children. At her workshop, named "Don de Dieu," she sews clothing that she sells to her clientele. This loan will allow her to buy an embroidery machine and thereby enlarge her clientele and satisfy their demands. Since 1994, when she first began this business, her life and that of her household have not improved according to her expectations. She has one grand ambition: to become a famous dressmaker of note.

loans.use: To buy an embroidery machine.

loans.name: Adévi

texts.fr: Revendeuse ambulante de pate dentifrice et de brosse à dents  depuis 2008. Mme  adèvi  jeune dame de 31ans est mariée à un commerçant et mère de 03 enfants.  Elle s’approvisionne au Grand marché de Lomé et est à son premier cycle de crédit, ce dernier  lui permettra  d’acheter les produits qu’elle vend et dans la mesure du possible louer une place pour asseoir son marché. Elle  aimerait aider dans  l’éducation des enfants et  dans les tâches ménagères.
texts.en: A door-to-door saleswoman of toothpaste and toothbrushes since 2008, Ms. Adèvi is a young woman aged 31, married to a merchant, and has three children. She gets her supplies at the grand market in Lomé and is on her first loan cycle, which will allow her to buy the products she re-sells and, as far as possible, to rent a place where she can keep her goods. She would like to help with the education of her children and the household expenses.

loans.use: To buy and re-sell toothpaste and toothbrushes.

loans.name: Zihué

texts.fr: Femme dévouée de 47ans, Mme Zihué a 03 enfants et est commerçante de mèches, canette, foulard. Son mari est carreauleur. Elle se donne à cette activité depuis 2007 et s’y plait énormément. Elle achète ses produits au Grand marché et revend au même lieu dans une boutique. Ce premier prêt lui servira à acheter de nouveaux stocks afin d’étendre son activité pour mieux s’occuper de ses enfants et participer à la charge de sa famille et pourquoi pas ajouter une autre activité parallèle.
texts.en: A dedicated woman aged 47, Ms. Zihué has three children and sells hair extensions, rollers, and headscarves. Her husband is a window-cleaner. She has devoted herself to her small business since 2007 and greatly enjoys it. She buys her goods at the Grand market and re-sells them at the same location in a small store. This first loan will help her buy new stocks in order to expand her business and thereby take care of her children and contribute to the family expenses, and also perhaps add an additional business activity.

loans.use: To buy hair extensions and rollers.

loans.name: Las Talentosas Group

texts.es:
Las talentosas es un grupo conformado por siete personas, cada uno con distinto negocio y con muchas ganas de salir adelante y lograr sus objetivos.
María del Rosario es una mujer que se dedica al servicio de limpieza en casas; pero a la vez prepara picarones, chocolates y lo ofrece en la zona donde vive, tiene clientes fijos, de igual modo vende productos de belleza. De ello ha obtenido ganancias que le ayudan a compartir los gastos del hogar, comprar algunas comodidades para su hogar sobretodo apoyarlos a sus hijos en sus estudios y está contenta porque son actualmente profesionales. Tuvo algunos inconvenientes a pesar de ello salió adelante tal es así que de a poco empezó a construir su vivienda. El crédito será para invertir en productos de belleza e insumos para la elaboración de chocolates pues esta muy cerca de celebrarse el día de las madres y habrá demanda.
texts.en:
“Las Talentosas” (The Talented Ones) is a group that consists of seven members. They all own distinct businesses and possess the desire to succeed and achieve their goals.

María del Rosario is a woman who cleans houses. She also spends time preparing donuts and chocolates. María sells these products in her area and has established customers. In addition, she sells beauty products. She has worked in this manner because it has enabled her to contribute toward the household expenses and pay for some of the comforts that helped her children with their studies. María is pleased that her children are now professionals. Despite some of the challenges she has had to face, María has been able to move forward and gradually begin the construction of her home.

She will use her loan to invest in beauty products and supplies for making chocolates in response to the demand she expects for Mother’s Day.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products and supplies for making chocolates.

loans.name: Yinis Miliana

texts.es:
Yinis, reside en Chinameca, departamento de San Miguel, ella vive con su familia, tiene tres hijos de 15, 12 y 8 años de edad, se dedica a la sastrería, este oficio lo aprendió de su madre, trabaja de lunes a viernes.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de telas de diferentes tipos y colores, botones de todo tamaño, esta compra le ayudara a tener disponibilidad de materia prima, siendo un gran apoyo ya que sus hijos dependen de ella.
Su objetivo es trabajar por sus hijos, ayudarlos mientras son independientes, también tiene para el futuro comprar más maquinas de coser.
texts.en:
Yinis lives in Chinameca, Department of San Miguel, with her family which includes three children (ages 15, 12, and 8). She is a tailor by profession and learned this trade from her mother. Yinis works Monday through Friday.

She is currently requesting a loan to buy fabrics of different types and colors, as well as buttons of all sizes. With this purchase, she will have enough materials on hand. This business provides a great deal of support since her children are dependent on her.

Her goal is to work so that she can help her children as they become independent. She also wants to buy more sewing machines in the future.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics and buttons.

loans.name: Rosa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Rosa, reside en Chinameca, departamento de San Miguel, donde vive con su familia, está casada y tiene dos hijos de 2 y 8 años de edad, tiene un negocio donde vende cosméticos y lociones, trabaja de lunes a sábado.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos como: cremas, lociones, esmaltes, maquillajes, entre otros que son necesarios para fortalecer el negocio.
Las aspiraciones de Rosa es que su negocio se mantenga, continuar con financiamientos para lograr establecerse.
texts.en:
Rosa resides in Chinameca in the Department of San Miguel, where she lives with her family. She is married and has two children, ages 2 and 8. Rosa has a business selling cosmetics and lotions. She works Monday through Saturday.

Rosa is requesting a loan to buy products such as crèmes, lotions, nail polishes, makeup, and other necessary items to strengthen her business. Her aspirations are to maintain her business and continue accessing loans so that she can keep it in operation.

loans.use: to purchase crèmes, lotions, nail polishes, makeup, and other items.

loans.name: Raimunda

texts.es:
La Señora Raimunda V. tiene 56 años D. edad, es viuda desD. hace 4 años, ella vive en Cochabamba sola con un hijo, Raimunda vive en la zona D. Maica Central, en una zona agrícola del departamento D. Cochabamba. 

La sra. Raimunda es una señora que dedica a la producción D. leche cruda y venta D. quesillos, en el mercado D. la ciudad D. Cochabamba, no esla primera vez que solicita un credito con ayuda D. Kiva, por lo que esta muy agradecida y contenta. ella se dedica al cuidado D. su ganado vacuno, la producción D. leche y la posterior elaboración D. sus quesillos y con ayuda D. su hijo. 

La Señora Raimunda esta convencida que su esfuerzo dara muy buenos resultados, que sus sueños D. que su hijo salga bachiller y estuD. un carrera se haran realidad, porque ella es una mujer muy emprendedora.

La señora Raimunda nuevamente desea un credito para la compra D. forraje para su ganado vacuno, siempre aprovechando que es mejor comprar en candidad que comprar en pequeñas cantidades. La Señora Raimunda desea que le vuelvan apoyar y confiar en ella comolo han hecho en la anterior oportunidad.
texts.en:
Sra. Raimunda V. is 56 years old and has been widowed for four years. She lives with her son in the District of Maica Central, a farming community within the Department of Cochabamba.

Sra. Raimunda is a woman who engages in raw milk production and the sale of cheeses at the market in the city of Cochabamba. This is not the first time she has requested a loan through Kiva. For this reason, she is very grateful and pleased. Raimunda takes care of her cows, gathers the milk they produce, and uses it to make cheese with the help of her son. She is convinced that her effort brings about good results. Her dreams incluD. seeing her son graduate from high school and study for a degree. Raimunda is an enterprising woman because she wants to see those dreams become reality.

She is seeking a new loan in order to buy fodder for her cows. Raimunda always takes advantage of buying in quantity as opposed to buying in small amounts. She has decided to return for assistance and hopes that she will receive it just as she did on the previous occasion.

loans.use: to purchase fodder for her dairy cows.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es: Sabina tiene 35 años, vive con su hija  en casa de un familiar. Desde hace 2 años vende dulces en la calle, en donde posee un pequeño stand móvil, instalándose en la puerta de los colegios u otros centros educativos. Es así que todos lo días se dirige ella con su stand muy temprano antes de que los alumnos entren al colegio y se queda hasta que culmine los dos turnos. Su trabajo es muy esforzado, pero su ímpetu de salir adelante hace que continúe, por ello procura siempre de que su negocio este abastecido con diversos productos comestibles y de golosinas, resultándole muy rentable su trabajo. Por ahora su mayor prioridad es tener una carretilla para transportador sus dulces. Es su crédito número 14 que tiene con MFP, trabajar en equipo es lo que más le agrada de su banco comunal además de que le ayuda a ser mejor en el control de sus finanzas por lo que esta muy agradecida y se compromete  a ser puntual en sus pagos en este ciclo de trabajo. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de dulces y gaseosas al por mayor.
texts.en:
Sabina is 35 years old and lives with her daughter in the home of a relative. For the past two years, she has been selling candy as a street vendor. Sabina has a small mobile stand that she sets up in front of schools and other learning centers. Every day she arrives very early with her stand before the students start classes and then stays until she has completed two shifts. Her work requires great effort, but the drive to move forward is what motivates her to continue. For this reason, she is always concerned about making sure her business is stocked with different food products and candies. These products make her work profitable. At the moment, her top priority is acquiring a cart for transporting candy.

This is her 14th loan with MFP. Sabina is very pleased to be a member of her Communal Bank because she gets to work as part of a team. She is grateful to be part of a group because it has helped her have better control over her finances. As a result, she promises to be prompt with her payments during this loan cycle. The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of candy and sodas in bulk.

loans.use: to purchase candy and sodas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for merchandise and showcases.

loans.name: Nestor

texts.es:
Nestor es una padre de familia de 68 años, tiene casa propia y vive con su esposa e hijos, que cuenta con el servicio de agua y luz, ubicado en zona rural del caserio del Taymi que se encuentra a 10 minutos del distrito de Illimo y a 30 minutos del departamento de Lambayeque.  Este distrito se caracteriza porque su gente dedica a la agricultura,  ganadería y artesanía..

Nestor se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales  y aves (gallinas, cabritos y ovejas), su corrales de se encuentran en la parte posterior de su casa.  A sus animales les proporciona alimentos  balanceados como pastos naturales y una vez que estos han llegado a su desarrollo óptimo los ofrece a la venta a los pobladores de ese distrito como también lo comercilaiza a otras personas foraneas o llevandolos a vender en los distintos mercados.

El préstamo solicitado por Nestor a Edpyme Alternativa es de 1500 nuevos soles, para comprar más animales para criar como su respectiva comida  y seguir ofertandolos para incrementar sus ingresos, con el único fin de poder sacar a su hijo adelante dándole una mejor calidad de vida.

Nestor como padre responsable y trabajador quiere superarse en la vida y sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Nestor is a 68-year-old father who lives with his wife and children in a house that receives services such as water and electricity. They reside in the rural section of the village of Taymi, which is located 10 minutes away from the District of Illimo and 30 minutes away from the Department of Lambayeque. The people who live in this area engage in agriculture, livestock breeding, and handicrafts.

Nestor raises and sells animals such as chickens, goats, and sheep. His animal pens are located behind his house. He provides his animals balanced feed, such as natural grasses. Once the animals have reached optimal development, they are sold to villagers in the district as well as to outside merchants who take the animals to different markets.

Nestor is requesting a loan of 1500 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa in order to buy more animals to raise and the appropriate feed. This will allow him to continue offering animals for sale so that he can increase his income since this is the only way for him to move his children forward and provide them a better quality of life.

Nestor is a responsible and hardworking father who wants to succeed in life and help his family get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase animals and the appropriate feed.

loans.name: Raul

texts.es: Raúl tiene 46 años, vive en casa de sus padres con su esposa y sus 2 hijos. Hace más de 5 años brinda el servicio de transporte de carga,  en la que cuenta con su propia movilidad, que es su esencial herramienta de trabajo. Es así que trabaja todos los días brindando este servicio, teniendo solo la hora de almuerzo para descansar. Las rutas de transporte que cubre es alrededor de su localidad que son las zonas rurales de su ciudad. En todo este tiempo ha visto la rentabilidad del servicio que brinda y lo más importante es el factor de la prevención por lo que periódicamente realiza un mantenimiento mecánico a su carro y de esa manera evita problemas mecánicos que pueden interrumpir un día de trabajo. Sus planes para el futuro fue el de adquirir otra movilidad más para generarse más ganancias. Es su primer crédito que tiene con MFP,  considera que trabajar de manera grupal es ventajoso para el logro de objetivos por lo que se siente tranquilo de pertenecer a su banco comunal y se compromete ser puntual en sus pagos. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de repuestos y pago del mantenimiento mecánico de su carro.
texts.en:
Raúl is 46 years old and lives at his parents’ house with his wife and two children. He has been providing transportation services for more than five years. Raúl has his own vehicle, which is essential for his line of work. He works every day to provide this service, only taking his lunch hour to rest. His routes cover the surrounding neighborhoods of his community, which include the rural districts of the city. Throughout the time he has been working, his business has been profitable. The most important factor in his job is periodic preventative maintenance of his vehicle so that he can avoid problems that will cause a disruption of his work.

His plans for the future include acquiring another vehicle for generating more income. This is his first loan with MFP. Raúl considers working in a group to be advantageous in helping him achieve his goals. He is pleased to be part of his Communal Bank and promises to submit his payments on time. The loan he is requesting will be invested in spare parts and mechanical maintenance of his automobile.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and to pay a mechanic to maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es:
Isidro tiene 49 años de edad y es casado sin carga familiar directa.  Actualmente su vivienda está ubicada en una zona rural llamada las Dunas ubicado 5 minutos de la ciudad de Lambayeque. Su vivienda cuenta con los servicios básicos (agua y energía eléctrica).  Su comunidad es pequeña de aproximadamente 500 familias.

Isidro se dedica a la crianza y  comercialización  de animales.  Esta actividad la realiza desde hace 5 años.  El negocio esta situado en la parte posterior de su  domicilio.  Aprendió esta actividad de sus padres, es decir tiene experiencia y conoce a la perfección el rubro.  El suele criar ganado porcino, ovino y pavos y patos y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen punto de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que siempre visitan la zona en donde vive.

Isidro cuenta con ingresos adicionales producto del transporte de pasajeros. Isidro trabaja como chofer de combi (carro con una cabina grande para transportas personas). 

Isidro esta solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa  de S/. 1500 nuevos soles, los que utilizará en la compra de agregados para realizar acabados en el interior de su domicilio.  De esta manera, reforzará la seguridad de su hogar y obtendrá una mejor  calidad de vida.

Isidro, es un cliente antiguo de Edpyme Alternativa, y cuenta con buen historial crediticio.
texts.en:
Isidro is 49 years old, married, and has no dependents. He currently lives at home in a rural area called Las Dunas, which is five minutes away from the city of Lambayeque. His home receives basic services, such as water and electricity. This small community has approximately 500 families.

Isidro raises and sells animals. He has been in this business for five years. Isidro operates his business in an area behind his house. He learned this trade from his parents and says he has acquired the experience and knowledge to do his job well. Isidro raises pigs, sheep, turkeys, and ducks. When the animals have reached the proper point of development, he offers them for sale to traders who frequently pass through the area where he lives.

Isidro generates additional income transporting passengers. He works as a minibus driver since this type of vehicle holds several people.

Isidro is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1500 PEN. He will use the funds to buy additional materials to complete the interior finishes of his house. This will make his home safer and provide him with a better quality of life.

Isidro is a long-time client of Edpyme Alternativa and has a good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase materials to complete the interior finishes of his house.

loans.name: Porfiria Benedicta

texts.es:
En la parroquia Ayacucho del cantón Santa Ana se reúnen cada quince días el Banco Comunal Amigas Por Siempre. Este lugar es conocido por su vegetación pero sobre todo por sus hermosos balnearios de agua dulce que son muy visitados por turistas locales y de otras partes del país.

La señora Porfiria es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta por las facilidades para conseguir los créditos ya que no piden tantos requisitos. Tiene 59 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene  seis hijos, dos fallecieron y los otros ya  son mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura.

Ella tiene un pequeño restaurante en un sitio turístico llamado El Badén De la Poza, allí arrienda un local donde prepara deliciosos platos para los turistas que llegan en gran números los fines de semana y los feriados, trabaja sábado, domingo y días feriados, desde las 06h00 hasta las  a las tres de la tarde. Trabaja sola.  Nos cuenta que tiene su restaurante por cuatro  años y que siempre le ha ido muy bien y que plato preferido de sus clientes son el caldo y seco de gallina criolla.

Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar arroz, carne, gallinas  y otros ingredientes para la preparación de los alimentos.
 
Sus sueños son tener su propio lugar turístico ya que esto deja muy buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
In the parish Ayacucho of the canton Santa Ana, the Communal Bank Amigas Por Siempre [Friends Forever] meets every two weeks. This place is known for its vegetation but above all for its beautiful sweet water spas. The spas are visited by many local tourists as well as by tourists from other parts of the country.

Porfiria is the founding member of the communal bank. She likes it because of the simplicity of getting loans since they don't require too much. She is 59 years old, is married, and has six children from this relationship. Two have died and the others are older in age and are independent. Her husband works in agriculture.

She has a small restaurant in a tourist site called El Badén de la Poza [The Dip from the Puddle]. There she rents a place where she prepares delicious entrees for the tourists that arrive in great numbers on the weekends and holidays. She works Saturday, Sunday, and holidays from 6:00 a.m. until 3:00 p.m. She works alone. She tells us that she has had the restaurant for four years and that it has always gone well for her. The entree that her customers order the most is broth and dry Creole chicken.

She is going to use this loan to buy rice, meat, chicken, and other ingredients for the preparation of the food.

Her dreams are to have her own tourist place since it brings in good earnings.

loans.use: to buy rice, meat, chickens, and more ingredients for the preparation of meals.

loans.name: Rosiris Del Carmen

texts.es: Rosiris M.  de 46 años vive en el barrio La Luz, al sur de la ciudad, allí se dedica a la venta de mercancías que compra de manera diversa de acuerdo a los encargos que le hacen sus clientes y también ofrece otros productos  a través de guías especializadas  o catálogos, ella es casada y tiene dos hijos en las edades de 22 y 25 años, con los que tiene el propósito de continuar educando hasta que alcancen su éxito. Ella inició hace 3 años su negocio con un capital que le regaló su hermana y desde aquí ha puesto todo su empeño en hacerlo crecer, como hasta la presente lo ha hecho. En la actualidad vende a habitantes del sector y a empleados de empresas mediante el sistema de crédito, acordando con sus clientes la  forma de pago y presentando buenos indicadores financieros. Este es su tercer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo organización con la que tiene tres años de estar vinculada; con sus créditos ha logrado ampliar su capital de trabajo y ensanchar la cobertura de sus clientes así como lograr la diversificación de su oferta, su desafío mayor es el capital de trabajo que aún no es suficiente para multiplicar sus clientes, por eso recurre a su credikiva con el cual surtirá su negocio con mercancía alusiva al dia de la madre como cubrelechos, ropa femenina, billeteras, calzado, cosméticos etc.
texts.en: Rosiris M. is 46 years old and lives in the La Luz nieghborhood to the south of the city.  There, she makes her living selling varius goods in accordance with her customers' orders.  She also offers other products for sale through specialized guides and catalogs.  Rosiris is married and has two children who are 22 and 25 years old.  She intends to continue their educations until they meet their goals.  Rosiris started her business 3 years ago with capital given to her by her sister.  Since then she has put all her effort into growing the business, which until now she has been able to do.  She currently uses a credit system to make sales to the residents in her area and to company employees.  She and her customers agree on a form a payment and good financial indicators.  This is Rosiris's third loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, an organization with which she has been connected for three years.  With her loans, she has managed to increase both her working capital and her customers' coverage.  She has also been able to diversify her sales items.  Rosiris's main challenge is that of working capital, which is still insufficient to dramatically increase her customer base.  That is why she is turning to a credikiva loan, with which she will stock up on merchandise for Mother's Day, like bedspreads, women's clothing, wallets, footwear, cosmetics, etc.

loans.use: to purchase bedspreads, women's clothing, wallets, footwear and cosmetics

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana tiene 36 años de edad, ella es casada y tiene 2 hijos menores de edad los cuales viven en la casa de su suegra. Su casa esta ubicada en una zona urbana del distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz 

Juana se dedica a la venta de tubérculos  como papas, camotes y cebollas en un puesto en el mercado Mochoqueque, Juana cuenta con más de 6 años de experiencia en el mercado menorista, con muy buenos resultados.  Ella se ha dado cuenta de la ampliación de su negocio y de la gran cantidad de clientes que ha ido captando, por eso necesita ampliar su negocio para cumplir con la demanda de su público.

Juana esta solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de s/. 1500  nuevos soles, para que pueda implementar su negocio con nuevas clases de tubérculos, esto le ayudará a tener una mayor variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes, abastecer a pequeños distribuidores y convertirse posteriormente en una distribuidora mayorista.

Juana es cliente de nuestra institución y a lo largo de todo este tiempo a demostrada responsabilidad y puntualidad   en todo momento.
 Juana es una mujer luchadora que  aspira a  cumplir sus sueños con entusiasmo y esfuerzo
texts.en:
Juana is 36 years old, married and has 2 young children.  They live with her mother-in-law in an urban zone in the district of José Leonardo Ortiz.  

Juana sells tubers such as potatoes, sweet potatoes and onions from a stand in the Mochoqueque market. She has been working in the retail market for 6 years and has had very good results. She realizes that expanding her business will attract a large number of customers and for this reason she needs to expand to meet the demand.  

Juana is requesting a loan through Edpyme Alternativa for s/.1500 nuevos soles [Peruvian currency] so that she can increase her business by carrying new types of tubers.  This way she will be able to offer a greater variety of products to her customers, supply small distributors and subsequently, become a wholesale distributor.  
 
Juana is a client of our institution and over time she has demonstrated that she is responsible and punctual at all times.  Juana is a hard-working woman that aspires to fulfill her dreams with enthusiasm and hard work.

loans.use: to purchase tubers (potatoes and onions) in large quantities to expand her business.

loans.name: Andrea Estefania

texts.es:
Lo de comerciante, Andrea Estefanía P. M. lo lleva en la sangre, pues su madre se ha dedicado a la venta de mercancía puerta a puerta, la falta de oportunidades laborales y de recursos económicos para continuar con sus estudios universitarios, impulsaron a esta joven de 20 años a iniciar con su propio negocio, una miscelanea en la ofrece diferentes productos. 

La violencia por la que atraviesa el sector de Itagui en el que Andrea tiene su negocio es una de las dificultades que esta joven emprendedora atraviesa, pues en algunas oportunidades esto limita sus ventas. Su perseverancia y ganas de salir adelante son los factores que la motivan a seguir luchando por su microempresa que en el futuro espera convertirse en una gran empresaria para generar empleo. 

Su negocio que apenas está empezando es la única fuente de ingresos de Andrea quien actualmente necesita de un préstamo para comprar más surtido y así ofrecer mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Being a saleswoman is in Andrea Estefanía P. M.'s blood since her mother has spent her life selling merchandise door to door.  A lack of work opportunities and financial resources meant that Andrea could not complete her university studies.  Instead, they drove this 20 year-old woman to start her own business.  Andrea runs a general store where she sells a variety of products.  

The violence in Itagui sector, where Andrea has her business, is one of the difficulties that this young entrepreneur faces since, on some occasions, it has limited her sales.  However, her perseverance and desire to get ahead in life have motivated her to continue fighting for her small business.  In the future, she hopes to become an important businesswoman who creates employment.

Andrea's business, which she is just starting out in, is her only source of income.  She currently needs a loan to buy more stock so that she can offer a larger variety of products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy stock: accessories, lotions and beauty products

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es: La Sra. Chayito como le dicen de cariño sus clientes y amigos ya tiene 17 años con su tienda de abarrotes, ella personalmente atiende a sus clientes y esta muy contenta por haber encontrado a la institución ya que nunca había obtenido un crédito que le diera la oportunidad de hacer crecer su negocio por lo cual en esta ocacion realizara  la compra  de mercancia para su negocio, actualmente  ella vive con dos de sus hijos que aun están solteros los cuales   laboran en una empresa maquiladora  y los fines de semana la ayudan a  atender  a sus clientes.
texts.en: Chayito, as her customers and friends affectionately call her, has owned her grocery store for 17 years.  She serves her customers personally and is very happy to have found Credituyo as she has never before obtained a loan with which she could grow her business.  On this occasion, Chayito will use her loan to buy merchandise for her business.  She currently lives with two of her children who are still single.  They work in a cross-border assembly plant and, on weekends, they help her to serve her customers.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Segundo Leoncio

texts.es:
Segundo tiene  44 años de edad,  él es casado y tiene 3 hijos. Segundo  cuenta con casa propia ubicado en el pueblo joven  Jesús Nazareno Cautivo  en el distrito de Monsefú, a 30 minutos de la cuidad de Chiclayo, él vive con su esposa,  en la parte rural de este distrito.

Segundo trabaja el alquiler de video juegos, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 5 años. Cuentan con clientela ya establecida en la zona en la  vive. Además Segundo se dedica a la crianza de cerdos los cuales al alcanzar tamaño y peso ideal los comercializa en el mercado local y con vecinos de su localidad.

Segundo esta solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de S/. 700,00 nuevos soles, que los empleará para la compra de un equipo de video juegos para ponerlo en alquiler, de esta manera podrá aumentar su capacidad instalada y obtener mayores ingresos de alquiler.

Segundo es un cliente nuevo para la institución sin embargo ya se encuentra bancarizado y cuenta con muy buenas referencias por parte de la personas que lo conocen. El anhelo de segundo es de poder brindarles un mejor estilo de vida a su  familia día a día.
texts.en:
Segundo is 44 years old, married and has 3 children.  Segundo has his own home located in the young town of Jesús Nazareno Cautivo, Monsefú District.  He is about 30 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.  He lives with his wife in the rural part of the district.

Segundo works in renting video games, an activity he has carried out for the last 5 years.  He has an established clinetele in the area where he lives.  In addition, Segundo earns a living raising pigs.  Once they reach an ideal size and weight, he sells them in the local market and to neighbors in his locality.

Segundo is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 700,00 PEN ($250 USD) which he will use to purchase video game equipment to rent. In this way he will be able to increase his installed capacity and obtain higher income.


Segundo is a new client at the institution; nevertheless, he has already banked and has very good references from the people who know him.  Segundo's wish is to be able to offer his family a better life style, day by day.

loans.use: to purchase televison sets for his video games and feed for his animals.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
While sweeping the brightly painted floors of a daycare center as a janitor, Susana had an epiphany – she no longer wanted to work in the cleaning industry.  Recalls Susana, “I thought - I want to be a childcare provider! This is what I want to do. This is the job for me.” 

With gusto and determination Susana enrolled in community college, earning her degree in Child Development and passing all of her classes with flying colors—quite a feat, considering she had only attended school through the sixth grade. 

Shortly after completing her education, she opened up a daycare center in her own home and named it—fittingly enough—"Happy Faces". Fourteen gleeful children, ranging from 20 months to five years old, come to Happy Faces Daycare Monday through Friday to sing the alphabet, learn their manners, and play games outside. “It’s very important to teach manners starting at a young age. You can be sure that all of my children [clients] know how to say ‘please’, how to share, and how to wait their turn.”

Susana has no problem ensuring happy faces on her clients. In fact, she maintains such a happy clientele that she didn’t lose anyone during the recession (when many parents lost their jobs and no longer needed or could afford childcare) and Susana currently has a full wait list with the names of children who are still in their mommy’s tummies!

Her daughter Rena noted, “I think my mom has a natural way with children, and when parents come by to pick up their kids they can see that. I know I’m biased, but honestly, I would recommend her to anyone.” Apparently a natural knack for working with children must run in the family—Rena is currently studying to be a teacher. “I saw how much my mom loves teaching and realized that this was something I could really enjoy as well.” 

But Susana wants to make her daycare even better. She requested a microloan, her third from Opportunity Fund, for $10,000 to continue improving her backyard to make it more kid-friendly. While the children currently enjoy playing tag in the front yard, modifying the backyard will not only provide them with a playground but will also be a much safer option.

loans.use: to renovate the backyard of her daycare center.

loans.name: Pedro Nolasco

texts.es:
A sus 70 años de edad, Pedro Nolasco B. M. se siente feliz de tener su propio negocio, un taller de elaboración de llaves, el cual desde hace 17 años se ha convertido en su única fuente de sustento para él y su esposa. 

De domingo a domingo, Pedro atiende su negocio que está ubicado en la parte de adelante de su casa, donde atiende a sus clientes, vecinos y conocidos, en el futuro, este luchador incansable espera tener una vejez tranquilo y con la certeza de que mejorará su calidad de vida. 

Actualmente, Pedro necesita de un préstamo para comprar materia prima que le permita mejorar su capacidad de producción y así cumplirle a sus clientes lo que le garantizará incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
At his 70 years of age, Pedro Nolasco B. M. feels happy to have his own business, a shop for making keys.  He started the business when he was 17, and it has become the only means of support for him and his wife.

From Sunday to Sunday, Pedro works in his business which is located in the front part of his house.  There he takes care of his customers, neighbors, and acquaintances.  In the future this hard-working, tireless man hopes to have a peaceful old age and with the promise  that his quality of life will improve.

Now Pedro needs a loan to buy basic materials so that he can increase his production capacity and be able to fill the customers requests which will guarantee more earnings.

loans.use: To buy supplies to make keys

loans.name: Viviana Narcisa

texts.es:
En la parroquia Ayacucho del cantón Santa Ana se reúnen cada quince días el Banco Comunal Amigas Por Siempre. Este lugar es conocido por su vegetación pero sobre todo por sus hermosos balnearios de agua dulce que son muy visitados por turistas locales y de otras partes del país.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Viviana, ella tiene 22 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre  y fruto de esta relación tiene una hija de tres años de edad. Su esposo es comerciante. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio, es la fiscal de pagos del Banco y le gusta por los beneficios que recibe de la institución.

Ella es una muy buena ama de casa que se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo y su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, también vende en su casa ya que hace poco compro unas vitrinas en las cual muestra sus productos a sus clientes, nos cuenta que tiene varios clientes que le realizan pedidos ya que la ropa que ella vende es seleccionada. Trabaja los sábados y domingos desde las 8h30 hasta las 15h00, deja a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Nos cuenta que lleva tres años que se dedica a esta actividad y que le ha ido bastante bien.

Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, camisas, blusas y ropa de niños.
 
Su sueño es tener algún día su propio almacén.
texts.en:
In the parish of Ayacucho in the Santa Ana canton, the members of the village bank Friends Forever meets every 15 days. The area is known for its vegetation and for its beautiful freshwater spas that are visited frequently by local tourists and visitors from other parts of the country. 

This is where 22 year old Viviana lives. She is in a relationship and has a three year old daughter with her partner. He is a merchant. Viviana has been in the communal bank since it began and is the auditor of bank payments. She likes the bank because of the benefits she receives from it. 

Viviana is a very good homemaker and she also works selling all types of clothing door to door. She also sells clothes from her home and recently bought a display case so she can show her products to clients. She tells us that she has various clients who order from her because she has a good selection. She works Saturdays and Sundays from 8:30 in the morning until 3pm in the afternoon. She offers credit and charges her customers every 8 days. She has been doing this work for three years and it has gone quite well for her. 

This credit is to buy pants, shirts, blouses and children's clothing. 

Her dream is to have her own store one day.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, blouses and children's clothing.

loans.name: Ydo

texts.es:
Ydo es un joven de 29 años de edad, él es soltero.  Vive en casa de sus padres quienes lo apoyan el su actividad y en su plan de negocio, su casa esta ubicada en  Tambogrande en la ciudad de  Piura.

La actividad que desarrolla Ydo es la venta de productos naturales, labor que realiza recorriendo caseríos cercanos y también en su propio domicilio y cuenta  ya con clientela establecida en su zona.  Ydo realiza esta actividad desde hace más de 4 años y ha adquirido experiencia en esta labor. 

Ydo esta solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de s/.600.00 nuevos soles   para que el pueda comprar de mas productos, ya que tienen más demanda en zonas rurales y no puede abastecerlas por falta de productos.  Ydo necesita poder atender a sus clientes más rápido, y así logra seguir creciendo en su negocio y mejorar la calidad de vida suya y la de sus padres.

Ydo, es un cliente nuevo y bancarizado por Edpyme Alternativa que tiene muchas probabilidades de seguir creciendo gracias a su espíritu empresarial empeñoso ya su responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Ydo is a 29 year old man. He is single. He lives in his parents' home and they support his activities and his business plan. Their home is located in the Tambogrande section of the city of Piura. 

Ydo is asking for a loan of $600 nuevo soles from Edpyme Alternative in order to buy more products, because he has a lot of demand in rural areas that he can not meet because of a lack of products. Ydo needs to be able to serve his clients more quickly in order to grow his business and improve his and his parents' quality of life. 

Ydo is a new client of Edpyme Alternativa and he has a great chance of growing his business due to his entrepreneurial spirit and his responsibility.

loans.use: to buy products for his business

loans.name: Marylin Esther

texts.es:
Marylin Esther O. de 46 años vive en la ciudadela 20 de Julio y se dedica al comercio de ropa, calzado, perfumería, platería y cosméticos en general; ella  tiene 2 hijos en las edades de 10 y 16 años con los que sueña ver prósperos y productivos y por eso en ese tema se esmera por lograr una educación de calidad y es precisamente su mayor motivación en el trabajo que desempeña como comerciante.
Marylin inició  su negocio en el año 2008, cuando una hermana le transmitió su experiencia  y ella no dudó en aprovecharla y trabajar en la venta de mercancías variada, ahora trabaja 6 horas diarias y las combina con su labor doméstica porque necesita estar muy cerca a sus dos hijos  para atenderlos también. Sus principales clientes son sus vecinos, familiares, referidos y especialmente empleados de empresas, a ellos les acredita la mercancía y otorga plazos adaptados a las características de cada uno. La competencia de su mercado es aguerrida y para Marylin este es su mayor desafío, pero como maneja muy bien  sus relaciones con los proveedores, logra precios que traslada a sus clientes,  con los cuales los mantiene fieles. Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que recibe de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo,  con el cual comprará ropa calzado,  cosméticos y platería para atender la demanda que tiene en esta época de gran despliegue comercial, porque se avecina el día de las madres y sus clientes encuentran soluciones de obsequios de calidad y a buen precio en el negocio de Marilyn. Su meta más adelante es emprender un punto de ventas en un centro comercial muy reconocido y ubicado en el corazón de la Ciudadela 20 de Julio, comunidad en la habita e interactúa un mercado formal e informal, conjuntos residenciales y escenarios deportivos como el Estadio Metropolitano de Futbol, donde juegan los equipos profesionales de Colombia y es la casa del Junior de Barranquilla “el equipo del pueblo”.
texts.en:
Marylin Esther O. is 46 years old and lives in Ciudadela 20 de Julio. She works selling clothes, shoes, perfume, jewelry and cosmetics. She has 2 sons, ages 10 and 16 and dreams of seeing them productive and prosperous one day.  That is why she strives to get them a quality education, which is her primary motivation in her work. 

Marylin began her business in 2008, when one of her sisters told her about her own experience. She didn't hesitate to take the chance and began to work selling different kinds of merchandise. Now she works 6 hours a day as well as working in the home because she needs to be close to her sons and to take care of them. Her main clients are her neighbors, relatives and referrals. She offers credits to workers and offers them customized payment plans. 

Competition is fierce in her market, and it is Marylin's biggest challenge but she manages relationships with her suppliers very well and achieves good prices which she passes along to her clients, keeping them faithful. This loan is her first  from the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation and with it she will buy clothes, shoes, cosmetics and jewelry to meet the commercial demand.  Mother's Day is approaching and her clients will find quality gifts at affordable prices in Marylin's business. 

Her next goal is to open a sales location in a well known and well located shopping center in the heart of Ciudadela 20 de Julio. The shopping center is in the town where she lives, near a residential area and sporting locations like the Metropolitan Soccer Stadium where Colombia's professional teams play and which is the home of Junior de Baranquilla, "the people's team"

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes, cosmetics and jewelry

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy and sell clothing.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es: Ricardo tiene 24 años, vive en casa de sus padres y en compañía de ellos. Junto a sus padres decidió abrir una panadería y pastelería, negocio que lo tiene desde hace 3 años, por tanto tiene que comprar continuamente insumos e ingrediente para elaborar pan y pasteles. Una vez ya preparados lo vende en su tienda, en donde también expende confites y dulces. Este negocio lo realiza de manera diaria y solo descansa los domingos, con el tiempo ha logrado ganar clientes, quienes gustan de los postres que prepara. Le agrada realizar este negocio porque considera que le ha permitido conocer a mas personas, por lo que decidido incrementar su capital de trabajo y mejorar la infraestructura de su local. Es su primer crédito que tiene con MFP, tiene muchas expectativas de como será esta nueva experiencia de trabajo grupal en su banco comunal ya que tiene referencias positivas al respecto y se compromete a ser un integrante responsable en sus pagos. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de insumos e ingredientes al por mayor.
texts.en: Ricardo is 24 years old. He lives in a house with his parents. Together with his parents, he decided to open a bakery and cake shop. He has had this business for three years now. Therefore he has to continuously buy consumables and ingredients to make bread and cakes. Once they are baked, he sells them in his store where he also sells candy and sweets.
