She was introduced to KADET LTD through advertisement done by the KADET staff. This is the first loan she has applied for from KADET. She is planning to use the loan to buy more stock like sugar, rice, wheat flour, and maize flour. 

She hopes to make a profit from the loan and use it to expand her kiosk to a wholesale store. She dreams of being a prominent business lady. She is a hardworking woman who can achieve more if funded.

loans.use: to buy more goods to sell

loans.name: Judith

texts.en: Judith is a 24-year-old single mother with a child living in a rented house in Kasese, Uganda. She solely looks after the family and her desire is to educate her child up to University level. She has been dealing in second hand clothes for five years. She started her business with 500,000/- shillings but now has more than 1,500,000/=. Her hardship is lack of enough capital and her vision is to own a boutique. Judith needs the loan to buy second hand clothes to sell.

loans.use: To buy second hand clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy fodder for his dairy cattle

loans.name: Hector Anibal

texts.es:
Hector E. de 56 años de edad, vive en una zona peri urbana con dos servicios básicos agua y luz sin alcantarillado, su casa esta ubicada en Paraíso de Guayaquil, tiene dos hijos uno de 20 años que está en la Universidad y uno de 10 años que estudia en una escuela particular. 

Comenzó su negocio hace tres años con la motivación de tener mas ingresos para su familia, en la mañana deja comprado las cosas para la tienda como helado, hielo y naranjas etc, en la que Hector sus hijos se encarga de la tienda 08h00 hasta las 23h00, una de las mayores complicaciones que tiene es la competencia en su sector y  la delincuencia.

Con el préstamo quiere comprar una vitrina, arroz, aceites, colas para incrementar su negocio, en el futuro quiere arreglar su casa para hacer un departamento para alquilarlo y tener otro ingreso para su familia y agrandar mas el negocio.
texts.en:
Hector E. is 56 years old and lives around an urban area with two basic services, water and electricity but without sewage.  His home is located in Paraiso de Guayaquil. He has two children, one is 20 years and goes to college and the other is 10 years old and goes to a private school.

He initiated his business 3 years ago, motivated to create more income for his family.  In the morning he purchases things for the store such as ice cream, ice, oranges, etc; meanwhile Hector's kids are in charge of the store from 8AM to 11PM.  One of the major complications he has is dealing with competition in his area along with crime.

With this loan, he would like to purchase a display case, rice, oils, and beverages to increase his business.  In the future he would like to fix his home and build an apartment to rent out and have another form of income for his family and to also increase the business.

loans.use: to purchase a showcase, rice, oils, sodas

loans.name: Ann Sereya

texts.en:
Ann Sereya L., age 22, is a married lady and a mother of one child. She has been farming on her own piece of land for the last two years, with a monthly profit margin of KES. 5,000. 


She learned about KADET from the KADET staff. She paid her previous loan well. Thus, she is applying for her second loan from KADET, which she will spend to purchase agricultural inputs.


She hopes to use the profit generated from the loan to expand her farming. She dreams of educating her children to a higher level. She is a hardworking lady who puts more effort in her work.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural inputs.

loans.name: Ayebi

texts.en: Ayebi A. is married to a farmer and they have two children. Ayebi helps pay for the children’s school fees and the utility bills, using her income from her provision stall business, which she has run for eight years. She sells items such as rice, sugar, condensed milk and slippers. She is keen to add more items to her shop to cater to her customers needs. A Kiva loan will allow her to purchase more slippers and more varieties of food items. She hopes that this larger selection will also help attract new customers to her shop. Any additional profits she earns will be reinvested into her shop to grow it further.

loans.use: to purchase more slippers and more varieties of food items.

loans.name: Ennest

texts.en:
Ennest is a 33-year-old married man with four children. He owns a four-room house in Kasese, Uganda. He started by selling coffee but later saved money to start a beer depot, which he has been running for the past six years. 
 
His hardship is breakage of empty bottles and his desire is to be able to supply beer to the western region of the country and have his own house in town. Ennest intends to use the loan to complete building his house.

loans.use: To complete building his house

loans.name: Yosia

texts.en:
Yosia is a 40-year-old married man with two children who owns a house in Kasese, Uganda. He has been in the produce business for six years.  He started by selling one sack of beans per week but he now sells four bags of each of  several cereals. 

His hardships are limited capital and high transport costs. His dream is to operate a large produce store and to educate his children.  Yosia needs the loan to buy maize, coffee and beans to sell.

loans.use: To buy maize, coffee and beans to sell

loans.name: Rael

texts.en:
Rael J. is 34 years old, a married mother of two children. She practices mixed farming, which she has been doing  for the last 15 years. 

She was introduced to KADET LTD by a registered client. As a result, she has applied for her first loan.  She plans to use the loan amount to prepare the land for the next planting season. 

Rael hopes to use the profit from this loan to reinvest back into her business. Her hope and dream is to become a great farmer. She is a vigorous woman who is dedicated to her work and who can do more if supported financially.

loans.use: to prepare the land for planting

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter B.  is 32 years old. He has been in the entertainment business for close to 6 years now. The father of 4 earns his livelihood working as a master of ceremony at various entertainment functions in and around Namulesa in Jinja. He says he earns 150,000 shillings each week. He says he began working in  a local theatrical group, where he developed his master of ceremony skills. 

Peter also does carpentry and has his own workshop.  With this loan, he says he is going to purchase wood to make more furniture to sell.

loans.use: To purchase wood to make more furniture to sell

loans.name: Deus

texts.en: Deus is a forty year old married man with nine children and he owns a house in Kasese Uganda.  He has been dealing in local brew for eight years in which he started with sales of ten jerrycans per month and now he sells 50 jerrycans.  His hardship is bad debtors.  His vision is personally distilling and selling local brew in Kampala city along with educating his children.  Deus needs the credit facility to buy local brew for sale.

loans.use: To buy local brew for sale.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert S. is 28 years old and lives in the town of Masindi in the Hoima region of Uganda. He is married and has two children, one of whom is currently in school. Robert has a restaurant business, which he has run for three years.
To help expand his business, Robert has requested a loan of 1,500,000 Ugandan Shillings from Kiva partner, BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase more food for cooking in his restaurant. With the help of his loan from BRAC, Robert hopes to generate greater profits and pay school fees for his children. In the future, he hopes to expand his business further.

loans.use: to purchase more food for cooking in his restaurant.

loans.name: Santusa

texts.es: La señora Santusa se dedica  a la agricultura y su esposo es productor lechero. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de semillas, como perejil, papas, etc. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la población de Palomar; es casada y tiene un hijo. Santusa se encuentra muy satisfecha con los créditos por que le ayudaron a mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Santusa works in agriculture and her husband is a dairy farmer. The loan will be used to buy many types of seeds including parsley and potatoes. She lives in her own home which is located in the town of Palomar. She is married and has one son. Santusa is very satisfied with her loans because they have helped improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy parsley and potato seeds

loans.name: Percy

texts.en: Percy is a thirty four year old single mother of three children and she rents a house in Kasese Uganda.  She has been selling secondhand clothes for twelve years in which she started with 300,000 shillings and now has 2,500,000 shillings as working capital.  Her hardships are damaged clothes and changes in market prices.  Her vision is to run a boutique, building a house and educating her children.  Percy needs the loan to buy rolls of bed sheets for sale.

loans.use: To buy rolls of bed sheets for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy beer, sugar and rice to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.en:
This Kiva borrower is a 42-year-old single woman from Lebanon. She is living with her parents and two siblings. She has owned a bakery since 2008. She produces delicious pies, pizza etc. and  her freshly prepared goods are enjoyed by members of her village and neighboring towns. She has one employee helping her with the work. Her bakery is an important source of income for her family. 

Today, she is requesting to borrow $1200 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to buy gas, flour and additional equipment needed for her business. She says that the loan will help her increase her productivity, her sales and thus her income. 

Lebanon has many pastry shop and bakeries and it is easy to buy fresh goods in one’s village or neighborhood. In the future, this borrower is planning to develop her business operation by opening a restaurant.

loans.use: to buy gas, flour and additional equipment.

loans.name: Peter Kimani

texts.en: Peter T., 45 years old and single, has run an electronics shop for about three years, earning a monthly income of 16,000 Kenya shillings. Having repaid his previous ones well and in good time, Peter is requesting his third loan in order to buy more electrical items and accessories to sell. He hopes to eventually have a big electronics shop and improve his standard of living.

loans.use: to buy electrical items and accessories to sell.

loans.name: Genara

texts.es: La señora Genara es dedica a la agricultura de verduras y su esposo se encuentra trabajando en los Estados Unidos. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes. Vive en casa propia  ubicada en la Localidad de Palomar del departamento de La Paz;  es casada y  tiene tres hijos. Con los anteriores créditos que consiguió a través de Kiva, tuvo la oportunidad de aumentar su capital de trabajo.
texts.en: Genara grows vegetables and her husband is working in the United States. Her loan will be used to buy seeds and fertilizer. She lives in her own home in the town of Palomar in the La Paz area. She is married and has three children. She has been able to increase her working capital through previous loans with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for her vegetable growing business

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es: El señor Gregorio es productor lechero. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de una vaca lechera de mediana calidad, para aumentar su producción de leche y por ende sus ingresos. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Pucarani del departamento de La Paz; es casado y tiene un hijo.
texts.en: Gregorio is a dairy farmer. His loan will be used to buy a milking cow of medium quality so that he can increase milk production and hence, his income. He lives in his own home in the town of Pucarani in the La Paz region. He is married and has one son.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow to increase milk production

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy coffee, tea, sugar, noodles, rice, and condiments

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fertilizers for the tea plantation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pants, jackets, and other items for his clothing store

loans.name: Rigoberto Antonio

texts.es:
Rigoberto pequeño comerciante, con más de ocho años en las ventas, negocio que inicio con ahorros de su trabajo en  el exterior. Su negocio es una pulpería en donde también vende medicina general para obtener mejores ingresos.
Fue a través de Afodenic que aumento productos de mayor oferta  a sus clientes lo que espera seguir aumentando y creciendo para un bienestar común de la familia.
Hoy con este nuevo préstamo comprara: granos básicos, y productos farmacéutico como: zepol, cofal fuerte, panadol, aspirina, alkadel, pastilla para parásitos entre otros medicamentos, que son de mayor demanda. Teniendo mejores ganancias al vender variedad.
texts.en:
Rigoberto is a small businessman with more than eight years of experience in sales. He started this business using the savings he accumulated from his regular job. His business is a general store where he also sells basic medicines to generate more income.

It was with the help of AFODENIC that he was able to increase the number of products that he offered to his customers. He hopes to continue increasing and growing for the good of his family.

Today Rigoberto is seeking a new loan to buy basic grains and pharmaceutical products such as menthol ointment, analgesic cream, acetaminophen, aspirin, alkaline tablets, anti-parasite pills, and other medicines that are in high demand. By selling a variety of items, he hopes to achieve better earnings.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains and various medicines to sell in his store.

loans.name: Tuwezeshane Group

texts.en:
Jonathan C., in his mid-thirties and a married father of three children who are still going to school, has been running a butcher business for 15 years now. He works from 6:00 am to 4:00 pm daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be Jonathan's fifth loan from Tujijenge, his repaid previous loans having been used to increase his meat stock and to start a cosmetics-selling business. He hopes for a loan to buy more meat and more cosmetcs and dreams of one day building his own house.

Jonathan will share this loan with his loan group "Tuwezeshane" which has a total of 15 members, who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loan portions.

In the picture Jonathan is the first person on the left front row in a dark blue shirt.

loans.use: to buy more meat and cosmetics.

loans.name: Israel

texts.es: El señor Israel es Chef y realiza contratos para eventos sociales especialmente buffets  semanalmente. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de insumos como ser: todo tipo de carnes, arroz, verduras, condimentos  y otros. Vive en casa de sus padres la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Obrajes de la ciudad de La Paz, es soltero y no tiene hijos. El cliente se encuentra muy satisfecho con los créditos que se le otorgaron  anteriormente ya que pudo mejorar y aumentar su capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Sr. Israel is a chef and has contracts for social events, especially providing buffets on a weekly basis. This loan will be used to buy supplies such as all types of meats, rice, vegetables, condiments, and other products.

Israel lives at home with his parents in the District of Obrajes in the city of La Paz. He is single and has no children. Israel is very pleased with the previous loans he has received since they have enabled him to improve and increase his operating capital.

loans.use: to purchase meats, rice, vegetables, condiments, and other supplies for his catering business.

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es: El señor Oscar tiene su vehiculo de transporte de pasajeros y trabaja como chofer en el sindicato taxi “CAR SUR”. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de un motor nuevo. Vive en alquiler en una casa que queda ubicada en la zona de Bella Vista de la ciudad de La Paz; Oscar es separado y tiene tres hijos.
texts.en:
Sr. Oscar owns a vehicle that he uses for transporting passengers. He works as a driver for the “Car Sur” taxi union. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy a new motor.

Oscar rents a house in the District of Bella Vista in the city of La Paz. He is separated from his spouse and has three children.

loans.use: to purchase a new motor for his vehicle.

loans.name: Merlyn Del Socorro

texts.es:
Merlyn tiene su propio negocio, en su casa de habitación, una pulpería que gracias a sus padres y financiamiento con Afodenic, ha logrado salir  adelante en su economía para el apoyo de sus tres hijos. 
Son cinco años trabajando en la inversión muy dedicada desde horas temprana abre para lograr mejores ventas. Lleva  tres ciclos trabajando con préstamos que le ah ayudado al desarrollo de su negocio. En donde también ha puesto venta de cosméticos, productos farmacéuticos y productos escolares.
Hoy con este financiamiento comprara: granos básicos, productos lácteos, gaseosas, golosinas, productos de aseo personal, productos de aseo del hogar, así como frutas y verduras, ya que son productos de demanda.
texts.en:
Merlyn has a home-based business, a store that she established thanks to her parents and a loan from AFODENIC. This business has enabled her to get ahead financially so that she can support her three children.

This investment has allowed her to work the past five years with great dedication. She opens her store in the early morning hours so that she can obtain better sales. Merlyn has participated in three loan cycles and each one has helped her develop her business. In her store, she has also sold cosmetics, pharmaceutical products, and school supplies.

She will currently use this loan to buy basic grains, dairy products, sodas, candy, personal hygiene products, household cleaning products, fruits, and vegetables since these items are in demand.

loans.use: to purchase various products for her store.

loans.name: Shirley

texts.es: La señora Shirley tiene un puesto de venta de frutas donde vende a su clientela frutas como ser uvas, plátanos, frutillas y otros; su esposo es electricista. El crédito lo requiere para adquirir fruta al por mayor y así podrá aumentar su mercadería, sus ventas y por consiguiente sus ingresos. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona de Alto San Antonio de la ciudad de La Paz,  es casada y tiene un hijo. Es primer crédito con IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Sra. Shirley has a fruit stand where she sells grapes, bananas, strawberries, and other types of produce to her customers. Her husband is an electrician. The loan she is requesting will be used to acquire fruit in bulk so that she can increase her inventory and her sales in order to generate more income.

She lives in her own home in the District of Alto San Antonio in the city of La Paz. Shirley is married and has a son. This is the first loan she has received from IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase fruit in bulk.

loans.name: Beymar

texts.es: El señor Beymar trabaja en una imprenta ya que su profesión es de Diseñador  Grafico. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de un equipo de computación ya que el cliente se encuentra estudiando Informática y este equipo le ayudará para el mejoramiento en el área que desempeña y en sus estudios. Vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona de Villa San Antonio Bajo de la ciudad de La Paz;  es soltero y no tiene hijos. Es primer crédito con IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Sr. Beymar works at a print shop as a graphic designer. This loan will be used to buy computer equipment.

He is studying computer science and this equipment will help him develop in his line of work and with his studies. Beymar lives at home with his parents in the District of Villa San Antonio Bajo in the city of La Paz. He is single and has no children. This is the first loan he has received from IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase computer equipment for his job and his school work.

loans.name: Leon

texts.es: El señor Leon tiene una pastelería donde elabora una variedad de masitas, tortas, queques y su esposa atiende la misma. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de insumos como ser: harina, leche, cremas, azúcar, levadura y otros, para continuar con el negocio. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona de Cota Cota de la ciudad de La Paz; es casado y tiene tres hijos. Esta será la tercera vez que solicita un crédito a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sr. Leon has a bakery where he makes a variety of pastries, tarts, and sponge cakes. His wife also manages the business. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy supplies such as flour, milk, cream, sugar, yeast, and other items so that he can continue his business.

Leon lives in his own home in the District of Cota Cota in the city of La Paz. He is married and has three children. This will be the third time he has requested funding through Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase flour, milk, cream, sugar, yeast, and other supplies.

loans.name: Damiana

texts.es: La señora Damiana es comerciante de artesanías, con la ayuda de  su hermana en distintas ferias de la ciudad. El crédito lo requiere para la cancelación del trámite de titulo de bachiller de su hijo mayor que ya se encuentra estudiando en la universidad. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona de Sopocachi de la ciudad de La Paz; es separada y tiene dos hijos. Es la primera vez que trabaja con IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Sra. Damiana is a craft merchant who works with her sister at different fairs within the city. The loan she is requesting will be used to pay for the completion of the paperwork required for her oldest son, who is currently studying at the university, to get his degree.

Damiana lives in her own home in the District of Sopocachi in the city of La Paz. She is separated from her spouse and has two children. This is the first time she has worked with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for the completion of the paperwork required for her son to get his degree.

loans.name: Luis Alfonso

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de negocio, de profesión mecánico, que con esfuerzo, logro poner su propio negocio con más de ocho años de experiencia en las ventas de piezas de vehículos usados como nuevas.
Atreves de los préstamos compra más productos de oferta, el cual da a precios accesibles a sus clientes. Lo que le ha generado mayores ventas al vender más barato. Gracias Afodenic ha logrado el objetivo.
Hoy en día como padre esta satisfecho por poder dar a su familia un poco de estabilidad. Sus tres hijos estudian para un porvenir mejor.
Las piezas a comprar: puertas delantera y trasera de carros, stop variado, bomber trasero y delantero. Teniendo en existencia mucho productos. Y que espera seguir aumentando
texts.en:
Luis is a businessman who is a mechanic by profession. With effort, he was able to establish his own business. He has more than eight years of experience selling new and used vehicle parts.

Luis utilized his loans to buy more products to offer so that he could keep prices affordable for his customers. By selling goods at a cheaper price, he has been able to generate more sales. It was with the help from AFODENIC that he was able to achieve this goal.

As a father, Luis is pleased that today he can provide his family a little bit of stability. His three children are studying so that they can have a better future.

Luis plans to buy front and rear car doors, various types of brakes, and front and rear bumpers. He has many products in his inventory and he hopes that it keeps growing.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of new and used vehicle parts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase law books for his job as an attorney.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en: Rose A. sells kenkey in Besease Village, near the fishing town of Elmina. Kenkey is a popular Ghanaian staple made from fermented maize dough. Kenkey can be eaten with various kinds of sauces such as pepper sauce. It is often served with meat or fish such as fried or roasted fish. Rose has been in this business, which she is now keen to expand, for the past five years. She needs a loan from Kiva to purchase more maize, fish and other ingredients to increase her food production. She intends to reinvest some of her additional profits and to save the rest for her children’s school fees. She is married with eight children and her income helps pay for their school fees and some household expenses.

loans.use: to purchase more maize, fish and other ingredients to increase her food production.

loans.name: Muyurina Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Muyurina inicia su ciclo 21 con 15 socias las cuales se dedican a la crianza D. animales menores, venta D. comida, siembra D. verduras.
María, es la Presidenta del Banco Comunal Muyurina en este ciclo, es conviviente, tiene 28 años y 1 hija D. tres años. Maria se dedica a la crianza y venta D. animales menores como cuyes, gallinas, chanchos y los venD. en los mercados D. Ayacucho. Con éste es el tercer ciclo que está en FINCA Perú ingresó por la invitación D. una socia, le gusta por la facilidad que recibe los préstamos y las capacitaciones que recibe D. su promotora. Está ahorrando para la construcción D. su casa.
texts.en:
The Muyurina communal bank is beginning its 21st term with 15 members who raise small animals, sell food and grow vegetables.

Maria is the president of the Muyurina communal bank during this term.  She is 28 years old, has a common-law partner and a three-year-old daughter.  Maria raises small animals such as guinea pigs, hens, and pigs, which she sells in the markets in Ayacucho.  This is her third loan through FINCA Peru.  She was invited to join by another member and especially likes the easy loan payment terms and training she receives through her promoter.  

She is saving to build a house.

loans.use: To buy small animals

loans.name: Saturnino

texts.es: El señor Saturnino es artesano y confecciona chalinas, también es empleado publico. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de telas así podrá aumentar la producción de sus chalinas (scarfs). Vive en alquiler en una casa ubicada en la zona de Tembladerani de la ciudad de La Paz;  es soltero y tiene un hijo. Saturnino es cliente de Impro desde el año  2006 y se encuentra muy satisfecho con los créditos que se le otorgaron.
texts.en:
Mr. Saturnino is an artisan who makes scarves (chalinas) and also works as a civil servant.  He is need of a loan to buy fabric to increase his scarf production.  He lives in a rented home in the area of Tembladerani in the city of La Paz.  He is single and has a son.

Saturnino has been a member of IMPRO since 2006 and is very satisfied with the loans he has received.

loans.use: To buy fabric to make scarves (chalinas)

loans.name: Rufo

texts.es: Rufo tiene 40 años, vive en compañía de su esposa y sus 2 hijos en una casa arrendada. Hace más de 5 años trabaja ofreciendo el servicio de transporte, siendo su principal herramienta de trabajo un vehículo. Cada día, recorre las calles de su ciudad en búsqueda de clientes que solicitan ir a transportarlos a distintos puntos de su ciudad y cobra de acuerdo a la distancia. Considera que su trabajo es rentable porque el servicio que ofrece es muy solicitado. Procura que su recorrido sea en zonas urbanas, por lo que significa prolongar el buen funcionamiento de su movilidad y retrasar el desgaste. Es por esta razón que desea mejorar y tener un carro más para poder trabajar con tranquilidad. Es su crédito número 16 que tiene con MFP, se siente seguro de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita,  lo invertirá en la compra de nuevos repuestos para su carro.
texts.en:
Rufo, age 40, lives with his wife and two children in a rented house.  For more than five years he has been earning a living offering transportation services for which he uses his automobile as his main work tool.  Everyday he drives through the city streets looking for customers to take to different parts of the city.  He charges depending on the distance.  He feels his work is profitable because it is much in demand.  He tries to provide service within the urban area to keep his car running in good condition without too much wear.

Therefore he wants to maintain and improve his car so he does not have to worry about his job.  This is his 16th credit through MFP.  He feels more secure being able to count on financial support and he has always been responsible in paying back the loans.  He enjoys being a member of the communal bank because it is made up of very dependable and supportive people.  He is grateful to all the lenders for this help in advancing his business.  With the loan he will buy new automobile repair parts.

loans.use: To buy automobile repair parts

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: El señor Daniel es chofer. El crédito lo requiere para la reparación de su vehiculo ya que tuvo un accidente de transito y necesita nuevos frenos y arreglar la dirección y trabajo en una puerta; el vehiculo  es la fuente de ingresos que tiene para mantener los gastos de su familia. Vive en alquiler ubicado en la zona de San Pedro; es casado y tiene un hijo. Es la primera vez que trabaja con IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Mr. Daniel is a driver.  He is in need of a loan to repair his automobile since he had a traffic accident.  The vehicle requires new brakes and repairs to the steering column and one of the doors.  His transport service is his main source of income and covers household expenses.

He lives in rental property in the San Pedro area, is married and has a son.  This is his first loan through IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: To repair and maintain his passenger transport vehicle

loans.name: Blanca

texts.es: La señora Blanca tiene una tienda donde vende cosméticos y también ella es profesora. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de una puerta para la tienda que tiene, para tener mayor seguridad contra robos. Vive en anticrítico en la zona de Vino Tinto de la ciudad de La Paz; es viuda y tiene un hijo. Es primer crédito con IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Sra. Blanca has a shop where she sells cosmetics and also works as a teacher. The loan she is requesting will be used to purchase a door for her shop in order to provide greater protection against thieves.

Blanca lives in a rental property in the District of Vino Tinto in the city of La Paz. She is a widow and has one child. This is her first loan through IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase a door to install in her cosmetics shop to protect against thieves.

loans.name: Urania Marbelly

texts.es:
Urania de 31 años de edad, casada,  con una familia de tres hijos todos estudiantes. Su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y usada con trece años en las ventas, en donde ha logrado la captación de clientes.
Iniciando con pocas ventas, ya que no contaba con mucho capital, que dio su esposo el cual es vendedor de chatarra, lo que le ha generado ingresos para apoyarse con los gastos básicos.
Este financiamiento lo hace con el fin de poder aumentar su inventario, y poder comprar en variedad como: faldas, short, camisas, camisetas, zapatos siendo de mayor demanda en sus clientes. Para ella es de gran beneficio este préstamo con pagos mensuales en donde captara más clientes como mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Urania is 31 years old, married, and has a family that includes three school-age children. She has been in the business of selling new and used clothing for 13 years and has been able to attract customers. Urania started out making few sales since she had little capital that was provided to her by her husband, a scrap metal dealer. Using what she had, she was able to generate income to support her family with the basic expenses.

This loan will be used to increase her inventory. Urania will be able to buy a variety of items such as skirts, shorts, shirts, T-shirts, and shoes that are in great demand among her customers. For her, the great benefit of making her monthly loan payments is that she will be able to attract more customers and improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase skirts, shorts, shirts, T-shirts, and shoes.

loans.name: Cristian

texts.es: El señor Cristian tiene una café Internet y también trabaja como chofer asalariado en el sindicato San Cristóbal. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de una máquina fotocopiadora para ofrecer más servicios a su clientela. Vive en casa de sus  padres, la misma que queda ubicada en la zona de Alto Chijini de la ciudad de La Paz; es soltero y no tiene hijos. Es la primera vez que obtiene un crédito en IMPRO.
texts.en:
Sr. Cristian manages an Internet café and also works as a salaried driver for the San Cristóbal taxi union. The loan he is requesting will be used to purchase a photocopying machine so that he can offer more services to his customers.

Cristian lives at home with his parents in the District of Alto Chijini in the city of La Paz. He is single and has no children. This is the first time that he has obtained a loan from IMPRO.

loans.use: to purchase a photocopying machine for his cyber café.

loans.name: Rosmery

texts.es: La señora Rosmery tiene una pequeña pensión donde ofrece comida a sus clientes; el crédito lo requiere para la compra insumos como ser: arroz, fideos, papa, y verduras. Vive en alquiler  en una casa que queda ubicada en la zona de Pasankeri de la ciudad de La Paz; es viuda  y tiene dos hijos. Es la primera vez que obtiene un crédito en IMPRO.
texts.en:
Sra. Rosmery has a small diner where she sells food to her customers. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy rice, noodles, potatoes, and vegetables.

Rosmery lives in a rented house in the District of Pasankeri in the city of La Paz. She is a widow and has two children. This is the first time she has obtained a loan from IMPRO.

loans.use: to purchase rice, noodles, potatoes, and vegetables.

loans.name: Carlos Jose

texts.es:
Carlos es una padre de familia de 51 años, tiene casa propia y vive con su esposa e hijos, la cual  cuenta con el servicio de agua y luz, ubicado en el pasaje Moore del distrito de Chepén y a una hora del departamento de la Libertad.  Este distrito se caracteriza porque su gente dedica a la agricultura,  ganadería y Turismo.
Carlos labora desde hace 10 años  como chofer de transporte público (colectivo – maneja auto en elque moviliza personas de un lado a otro, cupo máximo de su auto son 4 pasajeros), cubriendo la ruta Pacasmayo – Chepen, pero tiene un pequeño inconveniente que su auto es gasolinero y gasta una fuerte cantidad de dinero en gasolina, lo que no le permite tener mayores ingresos diarios en su actividad que realiza.
Por lo mismo ha visto la posibilidad de pedir un préstamo a Edpyeme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para realizar el cambio de sistema de gasolina a gas para que le sea más rentable el trabaja que realiza, y por ende le ayudará ha tener mayores ganancias para seguir sacando adelante ha su familia.  
Carlos es una persona muy conocida en su ciudad por ser muy responsable, respetuso con su pasajeros y con muchas ganas de brindarles una mejor oportunidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Carlos is a 51-year-old father who lives in his own house with his wife and children. Their home receives services, such as water and electricity, and is located along the Moore Passageway in the District of Chepén, which is an hour away from the Department of La Libertad. This area is known for its residents who engage in the agriculture, livestock, and tourism sectors.

For the past 10 years, Carlos has worked as a driver in the public transportation sector. He is part of a union and drives an automobile back and forth that can hold a maximum of four passengers. His route runs from Pacasmayo to Chepen. However, his problem is that his vehicle runs on gasoline and takes up a large expense. He does not earn enough money to continue his business on a daily basis.

For this reason, he is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2000 PEN so that he can convert his operating system from gasoline to natural gas. This will allow his work to become profitable and help him earn more money to continue supporting his family.

Carolos is a person who is well-known in the city for being responsible, showing respect to his passengers, and wanting to provide his children better opportunities in life.

loans.use: to convert his vehicle to a system powered by natural gas.

loans.name: Paulino

texts.es: El señor Paulino tiene una tienda de barrio en su domicilio; el crédito lo requiere para la compra de mercadería como ser: galletas, refrescos, azúcar, fideos, etc. Vive en casa propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona Ernesto Torrez de la ciudad de La Paz; es casado tiene dos hijos. Es la primera vez que obtiene un crédito en IMPRO.
texts.en:
Sr. Paulino has a neighborhood store that he operates in his home. The loan he is requesting will be used to purchase merchandise such as cookies, soft drinks, sugar, noodles, and other products.

Paulino lives in his own home located in the District of Ernesto Torrez in the city of La Paz. He is married and has two children. This is the first time he has obtained a loan from IMPRO.

loans.use: to purchase cookies, soft drinks, sugar, noodles, and other products to sell in his store.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: El señor Juan Carlos es empleado en una empresa de remesas desempeñando las funciones de mensajero. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de material de construcción  para la construcción de un muro lateral de ladrillo en su casa. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona de de la ciudad Llojeta de La Paz;  es casado y tiene tres hijos. Esta la primera vez que el cliente tiene un crédito en IMPRO.
texts.en:
Sr. Juan Carlos is employed as a messenger for a shipping company. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy construction materials for building a brick wall on the side of his house.

Juan Carlos lives in his own home in the District of Llojeta in the city of La Paz. He is married and has three children. This is the first time he has received a loan from IMPRO.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for building a brick wall on the side of his house.

loans.name: Sherly

texts.es: Sherly tiene 27 años vive en compañía de sus padres en la propiedad de ellos. La actividad a la que se dedica es la venta de comida, que junto a su mama, se asociaron para instalar un restaurante, ubicada en su misma casa. Es así que hace dos años que atienden a sus clientes mientras que su Mamá se dedica a la preparación de comida. Ambas tiene el control de la cantidad de comida que deben preparar y gracias a la buena sazón, la cantidad de clientela han ido en aumento. Su negocio es ventajoso porque el local de venta es propio y eso le permite no gastar en el alquiler. Le gusta desarrollar esta actividad porque es independiente en sus ingresos y puede disponer de sus horarios por lo que desea seguir mejorando en su servicio y atención a sus clientes. Es la segunda vez que tiene un crédito con MFP,  esta muy contenta de ser parte de su banco comunal ya que en este corto tiempo de permanencia que tiene aprendió bastante y esta muy agradecida por ello así mismo se compromete una vez mas a ser puntual en sus pagos. Con el crédito que solicito, comprará utensilios nuevos en cantidad.
texts.en:
Sherly is 27 years old and lives with parents on their property. She and her mother sell food in a restaurant established in their home. For the past two years, Sherly has been attending to the customers while her mother takes charge of preparing the food. Both of them have control over the amount of food to prepare, and thanks to its good flavor, the number of customers has increased. The advantage of her business is that she owns it and does not have to pay rent. Sherly enjoys developing her business because it allows her to be independent with her income and gives her the chance to establish her schedule. She wants to improve the service and attention she provides to her customers.

This is the second time she has received a loan from MFP. Sherly is very pleased to be part of her Communal Bank because she has learned a lot within a short period of time. For this she is grateful and promises once again to be prompt with her payments. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy a large number of new utensils.

loans.use: to purchase new utensils.

loans.name: Juana Luz

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MATEO PUMACAHUA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Chinchero, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana Luz; ella tiene 46 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales como chanchos, cuyes y gallinas y también vende artesanía en forma ambulatoria y los animales también los vende en forma ambulatoria llevando a lugares como Urubamba y Cusco, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar alimentos para los animales y también para comprar animales.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Juana Luz is a member of the Communal Bank “Mateo Pumacahua” which is located in the District of Chinchero, Urubamba Province, Department of Cusco.

She is 46 years old, married, and has two children. Juana Luz divides her time between her daily activities and her business of raising animals such as pigs, guinea pigs, and chickens. She sells the animals as a traveling merchant by bringing them to places such as Urubamba and Cusco. Juana Luz also sells handicrafts in the same manner. She wants to expand her business of selling animals, so she is requesting a loan to buy more of them as well as the appropriate feed.

Juana Luz is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to purchase animals and the appropriate feed.

loans.name: Jane Elizabeth

texts.es:
Jane de 46 años de edad, es soltera, vive solo en su casa propia que cuenta con los servicios  de agua, y luz solamente, ubicada en Nueva Arica, que pertenece a la Provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona tiene como actividad  principal la agricultura, ganadería y turismo .
Jane se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves corral  (gallinas, pavos y pollos), el corral donde viven sus animales se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con dieta balanceada.  Posteriormente vende sus animales una vez que hayan llegado a su tamaño y peso óptimo en los diferentes mercados de la ciudad de Chiclayo,  incrementando sus ingresos y obteniendo  cosas que le hacen falta en su casa.
El crédito que ha solicitado Jane es de 1000 nuevos soles a Edpyme  Alternativa, será destinado  para la compra de más aves de corral y su alimento respectivo, con la finalidad de que sus animales engorden y pueda venderlos a un buen precio para poder pagar su préstamo y al mismo tiempo  le ayudara  a mejorar su calidad de vida.
Jane es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa  que siempre ha sabido salir adelante para mejorar en la vida y poder tener lo que quiere.
texts.en:
Jane is 46 years old, single, and lives alone in her own house where the only services she receives are water and electricity. Her home is in Nueva Arica, which is part of Chiclayo Province. The main businesses in this area are agriculture, livestock breeding, and tourism.

Jane raises and sells poultry (hens, turkeys, and chickens). The animals are kept in pens that are located behind her house and she feeds them a balanced diet. When the animals have reached the optimal size and weight, she sells them at different markets in the city of Chiclayo. She has been able to increase her earnings and obtain things that were lacking in her home.

The loan Jane is requesting from Edpyme Alternativa is in the amount of 1000 PEN. The funds will be used to buy more poultry and the appropriate feed. She will fatten the animals so that she can obtain a good price in order to repay her loan and, at the same time, improve her quality of life.

Jane is a hardworking and dedicated woman who always knows how to get ahead so that she can improve her life and obtain whatever she wants.

loans.use: to purchase poultry and the appropriate feed.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MATEO PUMACAHUA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Chinchero, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Wilfredo; el tiene 39 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant y también tiene una tienda de abarrotes que junto con su esposa trabajan, su esposa administra la tienda de abarrotes y el socio trabaja en el restaurant desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de estos pequeños negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y restaurant.  El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar en el restaurant y también productos como arroz, azúcar, aceite y leche para la tienda de abarrotes.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “MATEO PUMACAHUA” community bank. The bank is located in the district of Chinchero, which belongs to the province of Urubamba and departament of Cuzco.

The member's name is Wilfredo. He is 39 years old, in a common law marriage, and has 1 son. He alternates his daily activities with his restaurant business. He also has a grocery store where he works with his wife. His wife manages the grocery store and he works in the restaurant from 9:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m. With these small businesses this member gets his family ahead. He wants to expand his grocery store and restaurant. He is asking for the loan to buy products to cook in the restaurant and also products such as rice, sugar, oil and milk for the grocery store.  

Wilfredo is happy with the loan and committed to making the payments on time.

loans.use: to buy products to cook in his restaurant and also products such as rice, sugar, oil and milk for his grocery store.

loans.name: Segundo Juan

texts.es:
Juan es un joven de 26 años que vive en casa de sus familiares en el distrito de Olmos – Lambayeque. Juan y su familia viven en una zona campestre  ubicada a 20 minutos de la ciudad, esta zona es de condición pobre y  por ello, ésta casa no cuenta con servicio de luz y agua.

Juan es conocido en su zona por ser una buena persona. Él se dedica al transporte de pasajeros, ofreciendo el servicio de mototaxi. La mototaxi es muy común en el Perú, sobretodo en las pequeñas comunidades; consta de una moto con una cabina en la parte trasera  donde se pueden transportar pasajeros.

Juan se dedica a esta actividad desde hace un año y la mototaxi con la que trabaja es de su propiedad. Juan también tiene otras pequeñas actividades que le permiten tener ingresos adicionales, como por ejemplo el empaquetamiento de frutas.

Juan solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles para el mantenimiento y compra de accesorios para su unidad vehicular. Juan siente que la inversión en su herramienta de trabajo, le ayudará a generar más ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.

Juan ha demostrado que su esfuerzo lo ha llevado a mejorar de a pocos su estilo de vida. En un inicio él trabajaba con una moto alquilada y gracias a un tiempo de ahorro pudo comprarse la propia. Éste cliente tiene un espíritu ganador y sobresaliente.
 
A pesar de que Juan es un cliente nuevo para Edpyme Alternativa, muestra capacidad y voluntad de pago. El cliente quedará muy agradecido con el préstamo porque le será muy útil en su vida y negocio.
texts.en:
Juan is a young 26 year old man who lives in his relatives' house in the district of Olmos – Lambayeque. Juan and his family live in a rural area located 20 minutes from the city. This area has a lot of poverty and that is why his house doesn't have electricity or running water.

Juan is known in his area as a good person. He works in passenger transportation, offering a motorcycle taxi service. Motorcycle taxis are very common in Peru, especially in small communities. They have a motorcycle and a small cabin in the back where passengers can ride.  

Juan has worked at this activity for a year and the motorcycle taxi he uses is his own. Juan also has other small activities that allow him to have additional income, such as fruit packing.

Juan is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles for maintenance and to buy accesories for his vehicle. Juan feels that investment in work tools will help him to generate more income to have a better quality of life. 

Juan has demonstrated that his strength has improved his lifestyle little by little. At the beginning, he worked with a rented motorcycle and thanks to his saving, he was able to buy his own. He has a winning and outstanding spirit. 
 
Despite the fact that Juan is a new client for Edpyme Alternativa, and he shows capability and willingness to pay. He will be very grateful for the loan because it will be very useful in his life and business.

loans.use: to do maintenance and to purchase motorcyle accesories.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en:
Efua A. cooks and sells red-red, a popular Ghanaian dish made from cowpeas cooked in red palm oil and red pepper, in Besease Village, which is near Elmina. 

Having been in this business for three years, Efua wants to expand it further by preparing larger quantities of red-red for sale. 

With her loan from Kiva, she plans to purchase more beans and other ingredients. She plans to reinvest any additional profits she earns back into her business for further growth.
 
Efua is married and has three children. Her income helps pay for their school fees and the household utility bills.

loans.use: to purchase more beans and other ingredients.

loans.name: Guzman

texts.es:
Guzman es un cliente de 37 años de edad, casado y  con 3 hijos en edad escolar. Guzman y su familia viven en la  zona rural del distrito de Lambayeque, en el caserío Virgen La Purisima . El lugar es una comunidad pequeña con un aproximado de 200  familias.

La actividad que desarrolla Guzman  es la  crianza y  comercialización  de animales. Guzman se gana la vida desde hace 6  años criando y vendiendo animales menores en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio, él suele criar ganado porcino, ovino y pavos y patos. Cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen punto de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que siempre visitan la zona en donde vive. Guzman aprendió esta actividad de sus padres, es decir conoce a la perfección el rubro.  Además cuenta con ingresos adicionales, producto de actividades relacionadas a la agricultura. 

Guzman solicita un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles, a Edpyme Alternativa, cuyo destino será la  compra de calaminas y viguetas para la construcción de un corral  de mejores condiciones que  el actual. Guzman invierte en esto porque sabe que  la crianza y venta  de animales es un negocio con un amplio mercado de comercialización, a pesar de la competencia.
texts.en:
Guzman is a client who is 37 years old and married, with 3 school-aged children. Guzman and his family live in the rural area of the district of Lambayeque, in the Virgen La Purisima settlement. This is a small community with approximately 200 families. 

Guzman's business is raising and selling animals. For the past 6 years, Guzman has earned his living raising and selling small animals in pens located behind his home. He usually raises pigs, sheep, turkeys and ducks. When the animals have reached a good stage of development, he offers them for sale to wholesale buyers who regularly visit the area where he lives. Guzman learned this business from his parents; that is to say, he knows this profession to perfection. He also has an additional source of income from work related to agriculture.

Guzman is requesting a loan of 1000 Peruvian new soles from Edpyme Alternativa, which will be used to buy corrugated metal sheets and joists to construct a pen that will provide better conditions than his current one. Guzman is making this investment because he knows that raising and selling animals is a business with broad market opportunities, in spite of the competition.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets and beams to build a pen.

loans.name: Asunta

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MATEO PUMACAHUA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Chinchero, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Asunta; ella tiene 50 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de papa y menestras como quinua, trigo y cebada y también tiene una tierra de cultivo donde siembra habas y arvejas y luego lo vende en forma independiente llevando a lugares como Puerto Maldonado, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de menestras y papas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar papa y menestras al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “MATEO PUMACAHUA” communal bank. This bank is located in the Chinchero district, in the Urubamba province and in the Cusco department. 

This member’s name is Asunta. She is 50 years old and married. She has four children. She alternates her daily activities with a business buying and selling potatoes and grains like quinoa, wheat and barley. She also has a plot of land where she grows beans and peas. She later sells them independently, by taking them to places like Puerto Maldonado. With this business, she is able to help her children move forward. Asunta wants to expand her grain and potato business. She is requesting this loan to buy wholesale potatoes and grains.

She is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy wholesale potatoes and grains.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en:
Efua A. is from Besease Village, near the fishing town of Elmina. 

She prepares and sells salted fish to make a living, something she has done for the past 10 years. 

Efua is now keen to expand her business and needs a loan to purchase more fish as well as sauce pans. She hopes that this will lead to increased sales and profits. She intends to reinvest the profits back into her business to grow it further. 

Efua is married and has five children.

loans.use: to purchase more fish as well as sauce pans.

loans.name: Florencia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MATEO PUMACAHUA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Chinchero, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Florencia; ella tiene 52 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azúcar,aceite,leche entre otros productos, la socia también de dedica al negocio de venta de chicha (bebida a base de maíz) y también vende jora que es un insumos que se usa para preparar la chicha, por medio de estos pequeños negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de chicha. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos al por mayor para la tienda de abarrotes y también para comprar insumos para preparar la chicha.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "Mateo Pumacahua". It is located in the district of Chinchero, belonging to the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco. 

Her name is Florencia. She is 52 years old, married and she has 3 children. She alternates her daily activities with her grocery store business. She sells basic needs products such as rice, sugar, cooking oil, milk, and others. She also has a business selling chicha drinks (a corn-based drinks) and jora, one of the ingredients used to make chicha drinks. It is by way of these small businesses that she is able to provide for her children. She wants to expand her grocery store business and her chicha drink business. She requests a loan to purchase products in wholesale for her grocery store and also to purchase ingredients to make chicha. 

She is happy for the loan and she is committed to making her loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase products in wholesale for her grocery store and to purchase ingredients to make chicha drinks.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos es un señor de  71 años de edad, soltero. Vive en una casa propia en la parte rural del distrito turístico de Túcume- Lambayeque.

La actividad que desarrolla Santos, es la confección de prendas de vestir. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace 19 años en su domicilio. Santos conoce a la perfección los gustos y las tallas de sus clientes, pues tiene una clientela ya establecida que no deja de pasar por su casa para darle los usuales encarguitos: subir bastas, entallar, remallar, coser, etc. Santos además cuenta con ingresos adicionales por la cría y venta de animales.

Santos solicita un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para la compra de telas, hilos y agujas. Debido  a que Santos no tiene competencia, la demanda que tiene es mayúscula y es por ello que él no puede abastecer por si sólo los gastos requeridos.

Santos,  es un cliente antiguo  para Edpyme Alternativa, su crédito anterior fue cancelado con puntualidad.
texts.en:
Santos is a 71-year old man who is single. He lives in a house which he owns located in the rural section of the tourist district of Tucume, Lambayeque.

Santos' business is the production of clothing. He has been operating this business from his home for the past 19 years. Santos perfectly knows the personal styles and sizes of his clients. He has an established clientele who never fails to visit his house to place their orders, including: hemming, sizing, darning, sewing, etc. Santos also has an additional source of income by raising and selling livestock.

Santos requests a loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 2000 nuevos soles to purchase fabrics, threads, and needles. Given that Santos does not have any competition he has an increased demand and that is the reason why he cannot meet the required expenses.

Santos is a long time client of Edpyme Alternativa. The previous loan was paid off on time.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics, thread, and needles.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
Magdalena es una cliente de 52 años de edad, madre de dos hijas a su cargo. Magdalena y sus niñas viven en la casa de sus padres en  un pueblo joven (comunidad de personas de condición pobre, cuyas casas están en desarrollo) llamado San Martín, en Chiclayo. Magdalena vive allí desde su nacimiento y este lugar ha ido progresando gracias a la inversión pública del Estado.

Magdalena se dedica a la venta de golosinas y diversos productos comestibles. Esta labor la realiza desde hace 10 años, en un kiosco ubicado en el exterior del Hospital Naylamp en Chiclayo. Lugar donde trabaja diariamente desde las 6 de la mañana. 

Magdalena desea invertir en compra de abarrotes, golosinas y gaseosas, agua entre otros y solicita un préstamo a Edpyme aLternativa de 1000 nuevos soles que será destinado a tener mayor stock en sus productos, para venta directa sin tener que esperar pedidos.

Magdalena tiene buenas referencias en la zona, por su trabajo y carisma.

Magdalena es un cliente recurrente de  Edpyme Alternativa, realiza sus pagos de manera puntual.  Este préstamo le ayudará a incrementar su mercadería y obtener mayores ingresos para  mejorar su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Magdalena is 52 years old and she has 2 daughters in her care. Magdalena and her girls live in her parents' house in a new village (a community of poor people whose homes are being constructed) called San Martin, in Chiclayo. Magdalena has lived there since her birth and this community has been developing thanks to investments by the State.

Magdalena sells sweets and various food products. She has managed her business for the past 10 years from a kiosk located near the Naylamp hospital in Chiclayo. She works every day, starting at 6 a.m.

Magdalena wants to invest in the purchase of grocery items, sweets, soft drinks, water, and other products. And for this reason she requests a loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles. The funds will be destined to acquire a larger inventory of products to proceed with direct sales, without having to wait for orders. 

Magdalena has good references in the region for her work and for her charisma.

Magdalena is a recurring client of Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) and she makes payments in a timely manner. This loan will help her increase her merchandise and to obtain a greater income in order to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase sweets, soft drinks, and groceries for her business.

loans.name: Marvin Jose

texts.es:
Marvin de profesión músico, oficio que aprendió desde muy joven, el cual ha sido su medio para apoyar a su familia, padre de dos hijos. Casado.
Con las ganancias de su trabajo logro poner una pulpería para lograr cubrir los gastos, y con financiamiento que Afodenic ha dado en tres ciclos lo ha invertido en inventario de la pulpería.
Hoy en día ha habido cambios, ya que su esposa está trabajando en servicios domésticos, el de músico en un comedor, y la venta la despacha su hija menor. 
El objetivo ha sido para equilibrar los gastos ya que todo está ah altos costos y las ventas hay día que son pocas.
Con este nuevo préstamo será para hacer divisiones a los cuartos, y tener privacidad con su familia. aun falta cosas por seguir mejorando lo que espera lograr atravez de los ciclos de los prestamo. Para esto comprara materiales de construcción comenzando la obra.
texts.en:
Marvin is a musician by profession, a skill he learned when he was very young. And this has been the vehicle by which he support his family. He is the father of two children and he is married.

With earnings from his work he managed to install a convenience store to help him cover the expenses. And with loans from Afodenic (Kiva Field Partner) over the past three cycles he has invested in inventory for his store. There have been some changes. His wife provides private custodial services, he works as the musician in a restaurant, and their youngest daughter carries out the sales.

His objective has been to cover his expenses especially because everything is so high in price and the sales have been slow. 

This new loan will be used to make divisions to the bedrooms to have privacy in his family. There will still be some renovations to be made but he hopes to achieve those in future loan cycles. He will purchase construction materials to start the project.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to make divisions in the bedrooms for privacy.

loans.name: Felipa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MATEO PUMACAHUA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Chinchero, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Felipa; ella tiene 38 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de venta de artesanía y también se dedica al negocio de crianza de animales como cuyes, chanchos y gallinas y el negocio de las artesanías trabaja desde las 8:30 hasta las 6:00 p.m, ella vende en la plaza de armas de chinchero, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de artesanía y venta de animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar artesanía al por mayor y alimentos para los animales.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "Mateo Pumacahua". It is located in the district of Chinchero, belonging to the province of Urubamba and to the department of Cusco.

Her name is Felipa. She is 38 years old, married, and she has 4 children. She alternates her daily activities with her crafts store and she also raises livestock, such as guinea pigs, pigs, and poultry. She opens her crafts store business from 8:30 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. She makes her sales at the Armas Plaza in Chinchero. She wants to expand her crafts sale business and her livestock sales business. She requests a loan to purchase crafts in wholesale and feed for the livestock.

She is happy for this loan and she is committed to making her loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase crafts in wholesale and to purchase feed for her livestock.

loans.name: Carmen Maria

texts.es:
Carmen es una señora de  30  años de edad, soltera sin carga familiar directa, actualmente vive en el caserío Sialupe Baca ubicado a 25 minutos  de la ciudad de Mochumi – Lambayeque. Este lugar es una comunidad rural,  pequeña de 200 familias aproximadamente.

Desde hace 6 años la señora Carmen se dedica a la venta de chicha de jora. La chicha de jora, es una bebida tradicional y muy popular en el norte del Perú. Esta chicha era una bebida tomada por nuestros antepasados y está hecha a base de jora (insumo similar a la malta) y maíz. Ésta es una bebida fermentada. 

Carmen es muy popular y conocida por su deliciosa chicha. Sus clientes están más que satisfechos con su producto y es por eso que siempre la visitan. Además de ello Carmen cuenta con  algunos ingresos adicionales producto de la comercialización de aves de corral.

Carmen solicita un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles, para la compra de jora, azúcar, ollas y tinajones necesarios para la elaboración y fermentación de la chicha. Esto le permitirá a Carmen seguir ofreciendo la chicha que sus clientes tanto disfrutan.

Carmen es un cliente antiguo de Edpyme Alternativa y tiene un buen record de pagos.
texts.en:
Carmen is a 30-year old woman who is single and she doesn’t family in her care. She lives in the community of Sialupe Baca, located at 25 minutes from the city of Mochumi, Lambayeque. It is a small rural community consisting of approximately 200 families.

For the past 6 years Carmen has been selling chicha de jora. Chicha de jora is a traditional and very popular drink in Peru's north. Chicha was a drink that was enjoyed by our ancestors and it is made from jora (an ingredient similar to malt) and corn. It is a fermented drink.

Carmen is very popular and well known for her delicious chicha drink. Her clients are more than satisfied with the product and that is why they always visit her. In addition, Carmen also has an income from selling poultry. 

Carmen requests a loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles to purchase jora, sugar, pots, and barrels which she needs to make and ferment chicha drinks. This will help Carmen keep selling chicha drink to her clients who enjoy it so much. 

Carmen is a long time client of Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) and she has a good payment history.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients to make chicha drinks.

loans.name: Enoc

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MATEO PUMACAHUA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Chinchero, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Enoc; el tiene 32 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de servicio de taxi, el socio trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, el también trabaja como mecanico, por medio de este trabajo el socio quiere mejorar en el trabajo de servicio de taxi, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de servicio de taxi.  El  socio solicita el préstamo para arreglar el carro y comprar repuestos.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "Mateo Pumacahua". It is located in the district of Chinchero, belonging to the province of Urubamba and to the department of Cusco. 

His name is Enoc. He is 32 years old and he is single. He alternates his daily activities with his work providing taxi services. He works from 6:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.. He also works as a mechanic. It is by this work that he wants to improve his taxi service. He wants to expand and improve his taxi services. He requests a loan to carry out maintenance repairs and to purchase spare parts.

He is happy for the loan and he is committed to making his loan payments.

loans.use: to carry out maintenance repairs to his car and to purchase spare parts.

loans.name: Felicia Santos

texts.es:
Felicia  D. 45 años D. edad; es una madre D. familia que vive con su esposo y  sus hijos en  su casa propia, la cual cuenta con los servicios D. agua y luz   en el asentamiento humano (lugar en desarrollo donD. existen pocas vivnedas ) Alan García del distrito D. Olmos  a tan solo 1 hora D. distancia del departamento D. Lambayeque. La ciudad D. Olmos se caracteriza por ser una zona D. mucha actividad agricola y ganadera.

Felicia se dedica  a la venta D. golosinas y bebidas desD. hace 3 años, en su domicilio. Lo que lepermite atender a sus clientela a cualquier hora del día y sus ventas diarias le va a permitir  tener mayores ingresos para las necesidades D. a su hogar.

A solicitado un préstamo Felicia a Edpyme Alternativa D. 3000 nuevos soles para  comprar mayor cantidad D. mercadería para implemntar su pequeño negocio y así su clientela tenga diversidad D.  productos para que pueda escoger y llevar lo que desee, al tener mayores ganancias pueD. brindarle a su familia un mejor nivel D. vida, con los ingresos que obtenga con sus ventas.

Felicia es conocida en la zona por ser una mujer trabajadora, que con mucho empeño desea que sus hijos tengan mayores oportunidades D. mejorar en la vida.
texts.en:
Felicia is 45 years old. She is the mother of a family and she lives with her husband and children in a house that they own. It is equipped with running water and hydro and it is located in the human settlement (region in development where there are only a few dwellings). Alan Garcia of the district of Olmos is only 1 hour's distance from the department of Lambayeque. The city of Olmos is known to be a region with a great deal of cultural and farming activity. 

Felicia has been selling sweets and drinks for the past 3 years from her home. This helps her attend to her clients at any hour of the day and the daily sales help her increase her income for the needs of their home.

Felicia has requested from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) a loan of 3000 nuevos soles to purchase greater quantities of merchandise to supply her small business. Her clients will have a variety of products to choose from and to purchase whatever they need. With a greater income she will be able to proviD. her family with a better quality of life.

Felicia is known in the region for being a hardworking woman who, with a great deal of effort, wishes that her children will have more opportunities to succeed in life.

loans.use: to purchase a large quantity of products to supply her store.

loans.name: Nicolas

texts.es:
Nicolás es un padre de familia de 35 años de edad. Tiene a cargo a sus dos pequeños hijos y a su esposa, los que viven junto a los padres de Nicolás en la zona rural del distrito de Reque – Chiclayo. Reque es una zona dedicada netamente a la ganadería y la agricultura. 

Nicolás  se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de tomate, maíz, pepinillo entre otros. Él cuenta con 10 años de experiencia en este rubro y le  resulta ser una actividad rentable. Nicolás trabaja junto a su familia en este negocio y con esta actividad piensa ganar lo suficiente para poder comprarse  un terreno propio, pues el terreno donde siembre no es de él.

Nicolás solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de  3000 nuevos soles que le servirá para completar el pago de su propia parcela. Con la experiencia adquirida de sus padres, Nicolás tiene muchos deseos de tener su propio negocio, basado en buenas cosechas.

Con anterioridad Nicolás ha pagado puntualmente los créditos que ha tenido con Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Nicholas is the father of a family and he is 35 years old. He has two small children in his care and his wife. They live together with Nicolas' parents in the rural region of the district of Reque, Chiclayo. Reque is a region that is solely involved in farming and agriculture.

Nicolas is an agriculturist who harvests tomatoes, corn, cucumbers, and other products. He has 10 years' experience in the field and it is a profitable business. Nicolas works together with his family in this business and with this business he plans on earning enough money to be able to purchase land for himself. The field that he cultivates is not his own.

Nicolas requests from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) a loan of 3000 nuevos soles. It will help him to complete the payment the purchase of his own field. With the experience he earned from his parents, Nicolas is very eager to have a business of his own, based on good harvests.

In the past Nicolas has made his loan payments on time with Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of land.

loans.name: Adolfo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MATEO PUMACAHUA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Chinchero, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Adolfo; el tiene 24 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de artesanía, el socio vende mantas, collares, chompas y chalinas en la casa taller del distrito de Chinchero, el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de artesanía. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar artesanía al por mayor.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank "Mateo Pumacahua". It is located in the district of Chinchero, belonging to the province of Urubamba and to the department of Cusco.

His name is Adolfo. He is 24 years old and he is single. He alternates his daily activities with his crafts business. He sells wraps, necklaces, jackets, and sweaters from the shop in his house, located in the district of Chinchero. He works from 8:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. He wants to expand his crafts business. He requests a loan to purchase crafts in wholesale.

He is happy for the loan and he is committed to making his loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase crafts in wholesale.

loans.name: Susy

texts.es: Susy tiene 27 años, vive con su hijo en casa de un familiar. Hace más de 6 años se dedica en la venta de artículos de belleza y de lencería de manera independiente, sin embargo es trabajadora de limpieza en una entidad pública. Es así que ofrece sus productos por catálogos, siendo estos de una marca reconocida en el mercado. Primero acuerda con sus clientes el pago al crédito del producto y al cabo de un tiempo entrega el pedido. Le agrada trabajar de esta manera porque puede tener 2 ingresos de manera paralela, tanto en la venta de cosméticos como el de su trabajo de servicio de limpieza y así sostener la economía de su hogar. Sus ventas han ido mejorando con el paso de los años y tiene un capital estable que le permite renovar su mercadería, En adelante quiere tener un puesto de ventas estable. Es su crédito número 15 con MFP, en este tiempo de trabajo en su banco comunal aprendió el valor del trabajo solidario de la cual esta muy agradecida y en este nuevo tiempo de renovación de crédito renueva su compromiso de  seguir siendo puntual en sus pagos. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más cosméticos y de lencería.
texts.en: Susy is 27 years old and she lives with her son at the home of a family member. For more than 6 years she has been selling beauty products and lingerie independently. She is also a custodian with a public company. She offers products from catalogues. The products are of a well-known brand in the market. First she makes an agreement with her clients about payments for the product and after some time she delivers the order. She likes to work this way because she can have 2 sources of income simultaneously. With both, her cosmetics sales and the income she earns with her custodial services, she is able to maintain the household's finances. Her sales have been improving throughout the years and she has a stable capital fund which helps her reinvest in merchandise. In the future she wants to have an established sales stand. This is her fifteenth loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and during this time with her communal bank she has learned the value of group work, for which she is very thankful. During this time of loan renewal she continues to be committed to making her payments on time. The loan which she requests will be invested in the purchase of more cosmetics and lingerie.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics and lingerie for resale.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MATEO PUMACAHUA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Chinchero, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Victoria; ella tiene 55 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesanía, ella realiza tejidos y mantas y también lleva a diferentes lugares como Urubamba y lo vende en forma independiente y lo vende en ferias, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de artesanía. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para hacer los tejidos y mantas para comprar hilos y telas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank "Mateo Pumacahua". It is located in the district of Chinchero, belonging to the province of Urubamba and to the department of Cusco.

Her name is Victoria. She is 55 years old and she is single. She alternates her daily activities with her crafts business. She knits wraps and she makes her sales in locations such as Urubamba, selling independently. She makes her sales at the fairs. She wants to expand and improve her business selling crafts. She requests a loan to purchase materials to make her knits and wraps, that is thread and fabrics.

She is happy for the loan and she is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase materials she needs to weave, including thread and fabrics.

loans.name: Isaias

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MATEO PUMACAHUA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Chinchero, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
